su gzung bar 'gyur te rgyal po chen po dag/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu dag mthong nas mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du'ang bsu
bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po pho
brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro//
deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bgyi'o/ /deng bdag gis chos mnyan
par 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o/ /deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par
'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par
@#/ /'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par
'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis brgya byin
nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng
bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs
thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags
pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis yul 'di dag thams cad kun tu bsrungs bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyi
dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po dag/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
bsnyen nam/ dge snyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim
gror byed/ mchod par byed cing rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na mi'i rgyal
po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel
bar 'gyur/ tshe 'di la rgyal ba'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro//
phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun par shin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag
gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong
@#/ /ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid
cing rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la bdag cag rgyal po chen po
bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de dag nyan cing bdag dang / lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad gcig sbyin par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das/ dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o/ /
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las spos dang /
bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la
spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur ro/ /spos dri rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung
bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag skad cig thang cig
yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po

yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu

bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste spos
dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis 'khri shing gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang bar 'byung
bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |rgyal po chen po dag /rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma
@#/ /zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag /mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir spos sna tshogs
de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu lag na pog snod gcig thogs pa de las spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te de dag skad cig thang
cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad na gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba
phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye
ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha
bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na lha dang / klu dang /
gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la spos dang /
bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos kyi dri rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba'ang 'byung bar

'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag /'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi
bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir mi'i rgyal po des
spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar
'gyur te de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnams
su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams su gnas par 'gyur/
de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur
@#/ /zhing snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po
dag |chos 'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na chos smra ba de la dgongs par
'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so/ /legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu/ zab mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mor
snang ba 'di lta bu/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur
ro| |su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dag ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa/ gser 'od dam pa
mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du
ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis de'i tshe de'i dus na tshig mthun pa dang / ngag mthun pa dang / sgra skad mthun pas dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri stan la 'dug
pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste
shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod
pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod byang chub kyi snying po la legs par brgyan
par byed par 'gyur/ skyas bu dam pa/ khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug
ste bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/
@#/ /khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med par rab tu zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ zab mo
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/
mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa brdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod chos kyi dung
bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam
pa| khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod sems can bye ba khrag
khrig 'bum phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag 'khor ba'i
'khor lo las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gi 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i
yon tan tshe 'di dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa
mthong nas snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag
spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis pa legs par phyag dar
bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyi chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis par bgyi'o/ /mi
mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen po dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen po dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen

po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu
@#/ /bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar
bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i
sa la bshams par gyur pa ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas
pa| gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad mthun par bgyis te mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa chen po
sbyin pa de la chos kyi bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba
dang | zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de'ang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba
dang | yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o/ /yul der yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad
las yongs su thar par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po de dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsti
stang du mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid na bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'di
dang | chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang /
mthu dang / stobs kyang mi skyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
bdag cag gis yul de yal bar bor na yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lha rnams kyis yul de yal
@#/ /bar bor na yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can
thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang / 'tshang 'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang / 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar
'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla
ba'i gza' dang / nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang / zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa'ang rtag par rgyun tu sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la 'ja'i
kha dog lta bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa'ang sgra 'byin pa grag par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char pa drag po 'bab bar
'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i yang ba 'byung ba 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar
'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / yul na
gnas pa'i lha dang / klu rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang yul
zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la de bdag nyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur/ bde ba thams cad bstabs
pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid
'tshal bar gyur/ yul thams cad yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba
dang | 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod
par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag
@#/ /cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po'ang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar
gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos
rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna
tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog ches khyad par du
'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum phrag de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi
slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lags so/ /ci nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ci nas
sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rang gi yul kun tu bsrungs bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad na gnod pa dang / dgra
ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul de dag na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur
ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar
bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag rgyal po bzhi dpung dang
g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag
cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ci
nas bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas dzam+bu'i gling thams cad du lo legs shing nyams dga' la skye bo dang /
@#/ /mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur
ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag
thams cad da lta na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag
pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag gis lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags
pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas
ches 'phags pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi don du gser
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dzam+bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /mi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang
dag dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dir nye bar bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu de dang / rkyen des mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gro bgyi/ mchod
par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas
gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba rgya cher gyis shig /
rgyal po chen po dag /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig/
@#/ /dang | de dag lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis/ ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
dge bsnyen ma bsrung ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gro zhing gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par
rab tu ston par 'gyur bar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang /
yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ bdag cag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis pa 'di sems can gang la la dag 'dzin cing 'chang bar mos pa de la bsod nams dpag tu
ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de la bdag gis bsrung zhing bskyabs pas de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal te bde bar gnas par bgyi'o/ /bsod nams dang / ye
shes kyi tshogs kyang bskyed par bgyi'o/ /gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin par 'dod pas lus bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di sngar brjod par bgyi'o/ /na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ mahA rA dzA ya/

tad+ya thA/ ra ra ra ra/ ku no ku no/ khu no khu no/ ru no ru no/ sa ba sa ba/ ka ra ka ra/ mahA bi kA raM/ mahA bi kA raM/ mahA kA la/ mahA rA dza/ rak+Sha rak+Sha tu mAM/ sarba satwA nAny+tsa swAhA/ bcom ldan
'das/ sngags 'di skud pa dkar po la sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa lan re bor te de ltar lan bdun byas nas dpung pa la btags na don de nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de
nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te spos gu gul dang / tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / du ru ska dang / a ga ru dang / spos dkar po las sogs pa 'di dag cha mnyam par

sbyar ba'i spos kyis mchod cing sngags 'di bzlas pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang bar bya'o/ /na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ mahA d+hA na dA ya/ tsaN+De shwa rwa ya/ A kaR+Sha/ a pa ra dzi ta/ tsaN+De shwa rwa/

pa ra ma/ ka ru Ni ka/ sarba satwa/ hi ta tsin+t+ra/ ma ma d+hA na bar+d+ho/ paR+ye sha swa yaM/ A kaR+Sha ya swAhA/ /sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas pa'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /sngags 'di 'don
pa'i dus su dkon mchog gsum dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la sngar phyag 'tshal bar bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa skong zhing
@#/ /nor sbyin pas sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas na sems can de dag yid bzhin du bde ba rnyed
par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i sngags kyi snying po 'di smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bai shra ba

NA ya| mahA rA dza ya/ tad+ya thA/ si mi si mi/ su mu su mu/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki li ki li/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ saM dA ya/ At+ma nAM/ ni ta t+yan/
an+d+har+d+hA tu swA hA/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya swAhA/ d+hA na dA ya swAhA/ na mo ra tha pa ri pU ra ya swAhA/ sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu khang pa dben pa'i nang du lci bas dkyil
'khor chung ngu zhig byas te bshos ci dang / ci 'byor pas mchod par bya'o/ /spos dam pa bsregs pa'i du ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing nyin mtshan du sems rtse gcig pas sngags
kyi snying po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas na de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i sras dzi nar sha b+ha zhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis de'i gan du mchis te
nga'i yab la ci zhig gsol zhes dri bar byed do/ /de nas bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir nor zhig gsol gyi stsol cig ces smos shig /de nas sras dzi nar sha b+has
yab la gsol pa/ skyes bu dam pa zhig dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir nor zhig gsol lo zhes gsol ba dang / yab kyis khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha pa Ni
brgya brgya byin cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas sngags sgrub pa des ltas de lta bu mthong nas don de grub par shes te gnas dben par bdag gcig bu spos bsregs la nyal khar sngas su dri'i
za ma tog gcig bzhag ste nyal bar bya'o/ /de phyin chad nang gcig bzhin du za ma tog de'i nang nas nor ci 'byung ba las nor de de'i nyin bar dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad me
tog dang / spos dang / zhal zas la sogs par sbyar ba dang / brel zhing phongs pa rnams la'ang sbyin zhing zad par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams par bsam mo/ /khro ba dang / 'tsho ba'i
bsam pa bskyed na de nyams par 'gyur bas khro ba'i sems mi skye bar rtag tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin pa des nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang /
gzhan yang sras dang / sras mo'i 'khor du bcas pa la rtag par bsam zhing bstod pa dang / bsngags pa bya'o/ /rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis gtong zhing lha la sogs pa rnams kyi mthu
dang | bsod nams mngon par 'phel par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba rgyas pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha de dag gis de ltar byed pa de mthong nas kun dga' zhing mgu rangs
@#/ /pas 'ong zhing de la bsrung ba dang / skyob par byed do/ /sngags mkhan de nyid kyang tshe lo dpag tu med par gnas shing ngan song gsum yongs su spong ba dang /
bgegs dang / bar chad thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di dag dang / gter gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul la dbang sgyur zhing bsams
pa thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te longs spyod can du 'dod na'ang yid bzhin du grub pa dang / bya dang / gcan gzan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/
sngags sgrub pa des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga'i nyin par ras dkar po la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka pi ta dang sbyar ba'i mtshon rtsis rgyan sna tshogs kyis
brgyan pa/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
bu bdag bu smad dang / 'khor du bcas par bris te gnas der bkram nas me tog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs mang po dang / mar me dam pa dang / zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs kyis nyin mtshan

rgyun mi 'chad par mchod par bya'o/ /sngags 'di zlos pas sems mi g.yeng bar bya zhing rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o/ /na maHshrI kaN+ThA ya/ bud+d+ha ya/

na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ yak+Sha rA dzA ya/ mahA rA dzA ya/ a ti rA dzA ya/ na maHshrI mahA de byai/ tad+ya thA/ ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra ba ra/ su shud+ho su shud+ho/ ha na ha na/ ma ni ka na ka/ badzre bai DUR+ya/ muk+ti ka/

a laM kriM ta sha rI rA ya/ sarba satwA hi ta kA ma/ be shra ba NA shrI ya de bI pra b+ha ya/ e hi e hi/ mA bi lam+ba/ g+hUr+Na g+hUr+Na/ pa ra s+ya pa ra s+ya/ da dA hi ma mA/ daR+sha na kA ma s+ya/ daR+sha naM/ ma ma ma na/ pra la ha
dA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang / mchod pa rgya chen po mthong nas bdag byams pa dang / dga' pa'i bsam pa skyes nas bdag de'i mdun du byis pa gzhon
nu'i gzugs sam/ yang na rgan po 'am/ dge slong gi gzugs su byas te bdag lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu gser gyi snod dang bcas pa thogs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas lus kyi
gus pa ston cing sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brjod de sngags mkhan de la 'di skad ces smra'o/ /khyod ci dang / ci slong ba de dag thams cad grub par bya ste/ nags tshal dben par 'gro 'dod
pa 'am/ nor bu rin po che 'dod pa'am/ mi mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'dod pa'am/ gser dang / dngul la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa'am/ sngags gzhan sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa 'am/
rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / sman bcud kyis len 'dod pa la sogs pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du grub par bya'o/ /bdag gis dngos po de dag la sogs
@#/ /pa mdo tsam zhig smos par zad kyi/ de ma yin pa gzhan zhig 'dod pa na'ang thams cad bsam pa bzhin du yongs su grub par bya ste rin po che'i gter mi zad pa
dang | bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dper na/ nyi zla 'di sa la ltung bar 'gyur ba dang / sa chen po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang srid kyi/ bden pa'i tshig 'di
ni nam yang slu bar mi 'gyur bas rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bzhin du skyid pa longs spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / bcom ldan 'das mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gang zhig
'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing 'don pa'ang rung sngags 'di sgrub pa'ang rung ste tshegs chung ngus myur du grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sems can dbul zhing
phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams kyi ched du sngags 'di bshad pas de phyug cing bde ba'i mchog dang / phun sum tshogs pa tshe gcig tu 'byor par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis
kyang de yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang zhing gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de 'dzin cing
rgyas par byed pa dang / sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag de gom pa brgya tshun chad 'od kyi snang bar byas te bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin stong rnams kyis kyang rtag tu de'i g.yog tu bsgo zhing
mngag gzhug yid bzhin du byed du gzhug go /bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di slu ba med par yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyis bus sngags de
skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so/ /legs so zhes bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis sems can thams cad sred pas gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad
bral bas phyug cing bde bar bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras pa dang / gzhan yang / mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du yongs su rgyas par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di bshad pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /de nas rgyal
po chen po bzhi stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas zhabs gnyis la spyi bo'i phyag btsal te de'i tshe
mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku/ /rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od/ /rgyal
ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan/ /rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshems/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste/ /rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis
gang | |ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang / /rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor los bris 'dra ste/ /khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong / /phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas sbras pa ste/
@#/ /zhabs kyi dra ba ngang pa'i dbang po bzhin/ /gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gda'/ /rgyal dbang dri med gser gyi ri dbang rgyal/ /yon tan thams cad ri
dbang 'dra ba ste/ /sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba chu zla 'dra/ /nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu lta
bur chags med pa/ /rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu
dag gis gser 'od dam pa yi/ /mdo sde dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di/ /'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni/ /brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas
bskyang bar bya/ /'di ltar mdo sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di/ /sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa/ /sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /'dzam bu'i
gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi/ /'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang / /sems can dmyal ba'i sems
can rnams kyi ni/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin/ /'dzam gling 'di na 'dzam gling gnas pa yi/ /rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis/ /rab
tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni/ /chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar gyis/ /gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bde ba dang / /shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dga' 'gyur zhing /
'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang / /sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis/ /'di ni mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni/ /yul la dga' dang bdag bde
dga' ba dang / /rgyal srid rnam par 'byor pa dga' ba des/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya/ /mdo sde'i dbang po mchog tu dge bar byed/ /pha rol dgra ni
yang dag zad par byed/ /pha rol dmag tshogs zlog byed dge bar byed/ /mchog tu 'jigs pas phongs pa sel bar byed/ /dper na rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes
pa| |yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar/ /rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang / /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta/ /dper na chu grang skom pa sel
byed pas/ tsha bas nyam thag tshe ni rnyed par ltar/ /yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la/ /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ /dper na rin chen thams
cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar/ /mi yi dbang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ /'di
@#/ /ni lha mi tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa/ /mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pas/ /'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa/ /bzhi po
dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin/ /phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad
pa na| /sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin/ /gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis/ /phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed/ /rab tu
dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/ /'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi/ /lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab
pa| |lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/ /chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni/ /gzi brjid dang ni stobs
dang brtson 'grus thob/ /gzi byin chen po yis ni lha yi lus/ /shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la
tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig tu ngus
nas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan lag kun 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan
'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor to/ /mngon par gtor nas kyang stan rnams las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas
pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan
'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po chen po re re la yang gnod sbyin lnga brgya lnga brgya dag /chos smra ba de la bsrung pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du rtag tu
dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /gal te mdo sde 'di las tshig gi don 'ga' zhig brjed par gyur na'ang bdag cag gis de la dran pa dang / mi brjed
pa'i mchog gi gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dag gang na bzhugs pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnams kyis yongs
su rgyas par byed pas/ nam yang nub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can de
@#/ /dag gis ye shes dang / spobs pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa thob pas/ nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/
bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing 'khor ba yongs su spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /gser
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhis yul 'khor yongs su skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //bam po bdun pa/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bsgoms pa rnams kyi ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gi don de gang lags/ de skad ces
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar khyod theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang /
theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin na/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ ji ltar khyod gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas
shing | chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'ang yin/ 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin/ dngos po can yang ma yin/ dngos
po med pa can yang ma yin/ rkyen las byung ba'ang ma yin/ rkyen med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin/ 'gro ba las byung ba'ang ma yin/ 'gro ba med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin/ chos
gang gi skye ba'ang ma yin/ 'gog pa'ang ma yin par chos ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas
kyi tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos
kyi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i lam gyi rig pa dang / stobs kyi gnas 'dri ba legs so/ /legs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa/
@#/ /shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs thob pas gang la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa'
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang / rten med pa'i chos kyi
rang bzhin gyi spobs pa can gyi slob dpon dang / lam la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs
pa| bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ legs
so| |legs so/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas nyid du brjod par bya ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang
la la gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des/ sangs rgyas la
bkur stir byas par 'gyur ro/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang la la gzungs 'di nyan par byed pa dang / gang dag gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa dang / gang dag mos par
byed pa de rnams la byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas/ sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzungs de ni 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ san+d+ha

ra Ni| ud d+hA ra Ni/ su saM pra tiSh+Thi te/ su nA ya/ su pra tiSh+Thi te/ bi dza ya la/ sat+t+ya pra ti dz+nyA/ su a ro hA/ dz+nyA na pra ti/ ut+pa da ni/ a ba nA ba ni/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/ a b+hi bya hA ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ su niH
shri ta| ba hu gu b+ha/ a b+hi ba dA swAhA// //shA radwa ti'i bu/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gis shin tu gnas pa dang /
par gzung ba byas nas 'chang bar byed pa de la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa bas lhag pa'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya phrag stong du'ang smon lam zad
par mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis chugs par mi 'gyur te/ dug gis ma yin zhing sprul gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA radwa ti'i bu/ chags
pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/ 'di lta ste/
chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/ /shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa
@#/ /phrag bcu rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yon du phul zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
bskal pa grangs med par na bza' dang / zhal zas gya nom par bzhugs par byed pa bas/ gang dag gis chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
las tshig gcig tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can de dag de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/
'di la chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yin no/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
las| chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis glog thams cad zlog pa/ so sor 'brang ba sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ nga yang da ltar 'chad
kyi zungs shig /kun dga' bo/ shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo/ lho phyogs na skang brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo/
nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo/ byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo/ gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi
ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/ gnas
gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu glog thams cad mi 'bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ drA bi Da'i sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/
ni mi ni mi/ ni min d+ha ri/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum las phyogs 'dir glog thams cad la srungs shig /srungs shig swAhA/ yang de'i tshe byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshigs rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ka Te bi ka Te/
ni ka Te/ pra t+ya r+thi ke/ pra t+ya mi tre/ shud+d+he/ muk+te/ bi ma le/ pra b+ha sA re/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ shwe te/ paN+Da ra bA si ni/ ha ri kaN+ka ri/ ka pi li/ piM ga la/ ak+Shi da d+hi mu
@#/ /khi| dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig /srungs shig /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid
kyis| bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swAhA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig
rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu nin d+ha ri mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ mahA ma ti/ hA hA hA hA/ khyod la sdig pa med kyi ma 'jigs shig ces lag na
rdo rjes smras kyis drA bi Da swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi bsrung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris pa de bdag gis rtag par
rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar bar bgyi'o/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba bskyed pa'i slad
du| chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzugs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swAhA/ prah+ma pU re swAhA/ brah+ma swa re swAhA/ brah+ma bi
su gar+b+he/ puSh+pa saM sta re swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni bdag gi bsrung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su
skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad las rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
de| bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod

par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ni ba rA Ne/ ban+d+ha mA dan+te ma ti ti/ ti ti gau rI/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ mA tang+gi/ par+Na le| hi na ma d+h+ya ma d+ha ri Ni ma la ni/ da la mad de/ tsakra bA krA+ai/ sha ba ri/
sha ba ri swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa/
dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad yongs su skyob pa lags so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang /
@#/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ d+hu ma pa ri hA re/ AR+ya pu sha ste/ shAn+ti/ ni rmuk+te/
mang+ga l+ya/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he stu ste/ sta bi te swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi bsrung pa 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes
bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ tsha skyong ba dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/ /
de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi bsrung ba chen/
po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/ glog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/ dug rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang
byad stems dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / se
sna spang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag klu rnams ni ser sna can te/ sems ser snas bskor
ba lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ AR+ya dze/ a ma ri/ a mr-i te/ ak+Sha ye/ a b+hi ye/ pu N+yai/ baR+ya ba te/ sarba pA paM/ pra sha ma nI ye swAhA/ AR+ya pu n+ya sau pA kI ye swAhA/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag skyes pa'am/ bud med gang la la lce la 'don dam/ yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jig pa thams cad ma mchis par rig
par bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang dag /gzhan yang / yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid
par mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
@#/ /dang | 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i dbang po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bzhin bzang dag /khyed skye bo mang po la phan
pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su yongs su bzung ba'i phyir drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa
legs so/ /legs so/ /phyogs rnams ni gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / klu'i bdag po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha
ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
dbang po'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis bla gos phrag pa
gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du spobs pa nye bar
bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gis brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi/ dge slong chos smra ba de la shes pa'i snang ba chen po bgyi/ gser
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig 'ga' 'am/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag cig yongs su nyams par gyur tam/ bskyud na bdag gis dge slong chos
smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang / yi ge thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /ci nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems
can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dzam+bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can
du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis
mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma
@#/ /mchis par rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal par 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la rab tu
mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskyud pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang
stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/
gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug long dang / khrag khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log
'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i sman dang / sngags
ni| 'di dag ste/ shu dag gi wang spr-i ka dang / /sha mya sha myi shI ri shA/ /in+d+ra hasta skal ba che/ /dzA ma shing tsha a ga ru/ /shi ri bista sra rtsi pog /gu gul ra sa sha
la ki |rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang / /tsan+dan dang ni ldong ros dang / /gi wang dang bcas ru rta dang / /gur gum gla sgang yungs kar dang / /dbyi mong sug smel na la dang / /
na ga ge sar u shi ra/ /'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas/ /skar ma rgyal la btags par bgyi/ /phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di/ /lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi//
tad+ya thA/ su te kr-i te/ ka ma ta li/ na le dza na ka ra te/ haM ka ra te/ in+d+ra dza li ni/ shaM ka ra dri pa shad dri/ a brta ka /se ken ku tra ku/ ka bi la/ ka bi la ma ti/ shI la
ma ti| shI la ma ti/ san+d+hi/ d+hu d+hu ma ba ti/ shi ri shi ri/ sad t+ya s+thi ta swAhA/ lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni/ /me tog sil ma dgram par bgyi/ /gser gyi snod
dang dngul snod du/ /mngar ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi/ /skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni/ /bzhi zhig der yang gzhag par bgyi/ /rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi/ /bum pa thogs pa
gzhag par bgyi/ /rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi/ /sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis/ /lha mo de ni legs par brgyan/ /bar bar
dag tu me long gzhag /mda' dang mdung rtse sna sprad gzhag /de nas mtshams kyang bcad par bgyi/ /de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam/ /sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis//
mtshams gcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi/ /sAd+ya the di na/ a ka ra ke /na ya ne/ hi le mi le/ gi le/ khi khi le swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su khrus
@#/ /bgyis nas sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na khrus kyis zhi bar sbyar ro/ /tad+ya thA/ sa ga De/ bi ga De/ bi ga ta ba ti swAhA/ phyogs bzhi
dag na gang gnas pa'i/ /rgyu skar dag gis tshe srungs shig /btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / /phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang / /'byung po'i khams rnams
'khrugs bgyid pa/ /'jigs pa mi bzad zhi gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ sa me bi sha me swAhA/ sa ga Da/ bi ga De swAhA/ bi ga De ba te swAhA/ sA ga ra saM bud+d+hA ya swAhA/ skan+d+ha mA tA ya swAhA/

nI la kat+thA ya swAhA/ a pa ra dzi ta/ biR+ya ya swAhA/ hI ma ban+d+ha saM bud+d+ha ya swAhA/ a ni bi la bak+t+rA ya swAhA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ prah+mA Ne/ na ma swa ra swa t+yai/ mahA de byai sad+d+h+yan+tu maM/
man+t+ra pa dA/ ta ra tu bi tsitaM/ prah+ma nu ma nu t+ya swAhA/ dge slong chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag gi don gyi slad du/ khrus
kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchi bar bgyi'o/ /lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nad thams
cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /ci nas dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par
'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren
gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can
khyod| skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te khyod kyi sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i tshigs 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni legs so/ /legs
so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze
kauN+Di n+yas lha mo dbyangs can de bkug go /lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che/ /'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tan che/ /rtser gnas mdzes
ma dUr ba rtswa yis gos bskus pa/ /dUr ba'i rtswa yi gos gyon spang pa gcig gis gnas/ /lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te/ /sems can rnams la
@#/ /dge ba'i tshig shod lce khrol mdzod/ /s+yad ya the da na/ mu re/ tsi re/ a ba dze/ a ba dza ba ti/ hing+gu le/ ming+gu le/ ping+ga la ba ti/ mung+ga She/ ma ri ts+yai/

swa ma ti/ da sha ma ti/ a gri ta ma grI/ ta ra tsi/ ta ra tsa ba ti/ tsi ri tsi ri/ shi ri mi ri/ ma ri ts+yai/ pra na bri ye/ lo ka dz+yeSh+The/ lo ka shreSh+The/ lo ka pre ya/ sid+d+hi pra te/ b+hI ma mu
khi| shu tsi tsa ri/ a pra ti ha te/ a pra ti ha ta bud+d+hi/ na mu tsi/ mahA na mu tsi/ mahA de byi/ pra ti grI hA/ na maska rA na/ bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig /bstan
bcos dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyu dang / sde snod dang / snyan dngags la sogs pa la/ bdag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ mahA pra b+ha be/ hi
li hi li/ mi li mi li/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig /kA ra te/ ke yU re/ ke yU ra ma te/ hi li mi li/ hi
li mi li/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen mo dgug par
bya'o| |gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dgug par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi
li mi li/ hi li mi li/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams
grub par gyur cig swAhA/ de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyi gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smras nas/ yang bram ze kauN+Di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu chen po/
khyod sems can thams cad la spobs pa dam pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / shes rab che ba dang / nor dang / dbyig la sogs pa sbyin pas phan 'dogs
shing myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa legs so/ /legs so/ /mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /gzungs
'di dang por su 'don pas/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag btsal te/ /'khrul pa med par bzlas byas na/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang
dam chos dang / /byang chub rang rgyal nyan thos dang / /tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / /rgyal chen bzhi la phyag 'tshal zhing / /rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa dang / /rim gro gus
par bsam byas te/ /zhi la dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /sgra bskyed gzungs dang bstod pa brjod/ /ji snyed sangs rgyas lha klu la/ /mchod pa rgya chen bsham par bya/ /skye bo'i
@#/ /rigs ni mang po la/ /snying rje'i sems kyang bskyed par bya/ /bcom ldan gser mdog mtshan rab can/ /rtse gcig sems kyis bsam bya zhing //
bcom ldan gsung rab dam chos kyis/ /dbang po so sor nges mdzad pa'i/ /de yi tshig don legs bsams te/ /stong nyid bsgrub la'ang gnas par byos/ /bcom
ldan thams cad mngon sum du/ /rtse gcig sems kyis bsam byas na/ /ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang / /gzugs mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan
dpal mgur gsung chos kyis/ /dam pa'i dbyangs des 'khor rnams 'dul/ /ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing / /so sor ci rigs ya mtshan ston//
de lta'i gsung mchog dam pa la/ /rtag par bsam zhing 'jigs pa spongs/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i ljags mtshan 'di/ /smon lam rgya chen dbang gis brnyes/ /chos
rnams med par ston mdzad pa/ /ji ltar mkha' la ma chags bzhin/ /sangs rgyas ljags mtshan gsung sgra la/ /de bsams smon lam tshad med 'grub/ /gang zhig
dbyangs can mngon mchod dam/ /yang na slob mas man ngag bzhin/ /lung bzhin chos de gang sgrub pa/ /bkur sti mchog rnams thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig ye
shes mchog sgrub ba'ang / /rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di zungs/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'phel zhing / /nges par 'grub la yid gnyis spongs/ /gang zhig nor
sgrub nor dang ldan/ /khe dang grags pa'ang de bzhin 'grub/ /'byung bar 'dod pa'ang rnam grol bar/ /nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs/ /yon tan mang po tshad med
dang | |bsam pa bzhin du kun grub pas/ /'di la tshul bzhin gang gnas pa/ /nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs/ /dben par gtsang ma'i gos gyon te/ /dkyil
'khor ci ran byas pa der/ /bum pa rgyas pa bzhi bzhag ste/ /dus bzhin me tog bdug pas mchod/ /ba dan gdugs dang lda ldi bre/ /phye ma byug pas rgyas par brgyan//
sangs rgyas dang ni dbyangs can mchod/ /lha de mthong 'dod mthong bar 'gyur/ /dbyangs can lha mo de mdun du/ /zhag bdun gsum du bzlas brjod de/ /gal te lha de
ma mthong na/ /bsam pa brtan pas zhag dgur bzlas/ /de yi nub mo'ang ma mthong na/ /gzhan du shis pa'i gnas btsal te/ /tshul bzhin lha mo'i gzugs bris la/ /
mchod cing bzlas brjod rgyun mi gcod/ /bdag dang gzhan don tshad med la/ /nyin mtshan rgyun tu brtson bskyed de/ /de yi 'bras bu gzhan la stobs/ /des ni bsam
@#/ /pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ste'ang bsam pa ma grub na/ /zla ba gsum dang drug dang dgu/ /yang na brtson pas lor bzlas na/ /mngon shes drug la
sogs pa'ang thob/ /de nas bram ze kauN+Di n+yas 'di skad ces bshad pa thos nas dga' ba dang / rangs pa tshad med pa skyes te/ 'khor 'dus pa de dag la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /lha dang / mi la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis sems ma g.yeng bar bdag la nyon cig dang / bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la
brten te dbyangs can lha mo mchog la bstod pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de smra bar bgyi'o/ /phyag 'tshal lha mo mthu chen la/ /'jig rten khams 'dir dbang brnyes
par| |sngon gyi drang srong gis bshad pas/ /de phyir bdag gis khyod la bstod/ /dpal ldan thugs ni bde ba dang / /thos 'dzin mdzes ldan grags ldan pa/ /
'jig rten 'di skyed yum yang yin/ /rtag tu dpal la brtson chen spyod/ /g.yul gyi gnas las rtag tu rgyal/ /snying rje bzod la dul bas bskyed/ /gshin rje'i
sring mor lung ston cing / /rtag tu dar gos sngon po mnabs/ /mdzes dang mi mdzes kun sten cing / /sbyan mig sus mthong dwang ba skyed/ /spyod pa tshad med 'jig
rten 'das/ /skyabs su su 'ongs rjes su 'dzin/ /bar 'ga' ri dang brag la gnas/ /bar 'ga' phug dang chu bo'i 'gram/ /yang na ljon sdong nags rnams su/ /gnas de dag
ni lha mo'i rten/ /ji ltar ri brag mi rnams kyis/ /rma bya'i mdongs las gdugs byas shing / /rtag tu lha mo de mchod na/ /thams cad dus su 'jig rten skyob/ /stag dang
seng ges 'khor byas shing / /bya dang phyugs dang de la brten/ /dri chen sgra dag mngon bsgrags pas/ /bin d+hu'i ri la'ang grags par gyur/ /phyag na tri shUl thor tshugs
dbu| |yang na nyi zla'i ru mtshon bsnams/ /zla ba mar ngo'i bcu gcig gam/ /dag yi dus su mchod par bya/ /g.yul 'gyed dus su thugs brtse bas/ /'jig rten kun
la gzigs pa'i phyir/ /lha mo ba su'i gzugs ston pas/ /lha mo'i mchog de dpe med pa'o/ /phyugs rdzi rgan mo'i gzugs ston cing / /lha dag 'thab pa'ang rtag tu
rgyal| |yun ring 'jig rten bde bar gnas/ /bar 'ga' khros shing bar 'ga' zhi/ /bram zer smra zhing chos bzhi dang / /rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags kun la mkhas/ /drang
srong lha mi dbang brnyes pas/ /sa chen 'di dang sa bon byed/ /lha mo 'du ba'i dus su yang / /rgya mtsho ltad bzhin nges par 'du/ /gnod sbyin klu la sogs rnams
@#/ /kyis| |kun gyi gtso byed 'dul bar nus/ /mo rnams kun gyi tshangs spyod mchog /'jig rten gtso sbyin bdag la dgongs/ /rgyal bo'i gnas na'ang
pad+ma bzhin/ /chu bo la yang gru dang gzings/ /zla ba nya bzhin zhal yang rgyas/ /mang du thos ldan rten yang byed/ /ri bo'i rtse bzhin spobs pa 'phags/ /bsam pas
gling dang rab kyang ston/ /lha min la sogs lha rnams kyis/ /kun gyis yon tan bstod cing bsngags/ /spyan stong brgya byin lha rgyal yang / /gus pa'i sems kyis
zhal du blta/ /sems can gang dag ci 'dod pa/ /de kun bsam pa myur du skong / /blo myur thos pa 'dzin pa yang / /sa chen 'di gnas kun gyi mchog /phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten khams dag tu/ /rtag tu sgron chen snang byed bzhin/ /bya dang gcan zan ri dwags kyi'ang / /kun gyis bsam pa yongs su skong / /bud med kyi mchog ri
po bzhin/ /drang srong 'jig rten ri gnas bzhin/ /lha mo gzhon bzhin 'dod dang bral/ /mi mjed bdag bzhin bden par smra/ /'jig rten mthun par gzugs ston
cing | |'dod khams bar gyi lha gnas su'ang / /khyod ni lha mo'i gtso yin pas/ /de las mchog pa'i sems can med/ /gal te g.yul dang 'jigs pa'i gnas//
me yi dong du lhung gyur tam/ /chu bo g.yang sa mi rgod las/ /'jigs pa de las sgrol bar mdzad/ /rgyal po'i chad pas bcings pa yang / /yang na dgra yis bsad par
yang | |rtse gcig sems ni ma g.yos na/ /sdug bsngal dag las thar bar 'gyur/ /dge dang mi dge kun las skyob/ /byams dang snying rjes mdun na gnas/ /de phyir bdag
ni sems btud de/ /phyag 'tshal lha mo chen mo la'o/ /de nas yang slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+yas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
gis mngon par bstod do/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyan par gyis/ /lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /bud med dam pa lha mo mchog
gis rab gang yin/ /lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod/ /yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag brgyan/ /dbyangs can zhes bya spyan ni
yangs shing bsod nams 'bar/ /dri med ye shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bur blta ba'i phyir/ /mchog rab dag
gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do/ /dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang / /yang dag bsngags pa yon tan byed pa dang / /dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang /
@#/ /mig mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang / /dge ba'i gnas dang dge ba mthong ba dang / /yon tan bsam mi khyab pas brgyan pa dang / /zla ba dang
'dra dri ma med 'od dang / /ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang / /seng+ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang / /lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang / /mda' gzhu mdung
dang ral gri dgra sta dang / /be con lcags kyu 'khor lo zhags pa bsnams/ /zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i zhal/ /yid du 'ong ba'i dag dang dbyangs snyan dang / /shes
rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang / /dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang / /lha dang lha min dbang pos mchod pa dang / /lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas
brjod dang / /'byung po'i tshogs kyi gnas rtag mchod pa'i phyir/ /swAhA/ bdag cag lha mi 'di la phyag bya'o/ /bdag la yon tan khyad par kun stsol cig /
dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub stsol/ /dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu srungs/ /yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni/ /nang par langs nas gtsang
mar brjod par bya/ /bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad rnyed/ /dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze kauN+Di n+ya la
legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ khyod kyis sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir lha mo dbyangs can la bstod pa dang / dngos grub dam pa slong bas bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan
par 'gyur ro// //bam po brgyad pa/ de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+ya sa bstod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig gis lha mo chen mo dbyangs
can la gsol nas/ yang 'khor de dag la smras pa/ skyes bu khyod kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba dang / de'i thugs rjes bskyab cing / tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thogs pa
med pa dang / thos pa 'dzin cing shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing / tshig sbyor ba'i rgyan la gsal zhing thogs pa med
pa grub par 'dod pas/ bsam pa de des shing gus pa'i sems kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
lo| |chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa dang /
'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par bden
@#/ /pa'i gsung la gnas pa/ so so'i dbang po dang mthun par bden pa ston pa la mi slu bar gsung ba/ bskal pa bye ba tshad med par yang
dag par bden pa'i tshig rtag tu ston cing gsung pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo / /bden pa gsung bas ljags yangs la ring ba bkram ste dzam+bu'i gling dang / rgyal
chen bzhi dang / stong gcig dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa thams cad
rgyas par 'gengs shing / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad sel ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la lus btud de phyag 'tshal lo/ /ljags
kyi mtshan dam pa de 'dra ba dang / bdag spobs pa tshad med pa dang ldan par gyur cig /phyag 'tshal bcom ldan dbyangs can mchog /byang chub chen po
dbyangs can mchog /'phags pa rang rgyal dbyangs can mchog /zung bzhi ya brgyad dbyangs can mchog /bden pa bzhi gsung dbyangs can mchog /yang dag
gzigs pa dbyangs can mchog /drang srong tshangs 'khor dbyangs can mchog /lha mo u ma dbyangs can mchog /skem byed lha yang dbyangs can mchog /gzi can
klu yang dbyangs can mchog /mtshan mo lha mo dbyangs can mchog /rgyal chen bzhi po dbyangs can mchog /bde gnas lha sras dbyangs can mchog /rdo rje gsang bdag
dbyangs can mchog /khyab 'jug lha yang dbyangs can mchog /lha mo be ma dbyangs can mchog /tshogs bdag lha yang dbyangs can mchog /dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs
can mchog /dpal gyi blo gros dbyangs can mchog /hi ri tshig 'chang dbyangs can mchog /ma mo kun mchog dbyangs can mchog /'phrog ma mo yang dbyangs can
mchog /gnod sbyin kun kyang dbyangs can mchog /phyogs bcu'i rgyal po dbyangs can mchog /bdag la las mchog kun gyis stobs/ /mtha' med dbyangs can
mchog thob mdzod/ /slu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcings pa bcad la phyag
'tshal lo/ /rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden tshig gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo//
don dam gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor mang gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs can lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni tshig la thogs med mdzod/ /bdag gis bsam
@#/ /pa ci mchis pa/ /thams cad myur du grub par mdzod/ /nad med rtag tu bde ba dang / /tshe ring ba yang thob par shog /rig pa'i gnas
la mkhas pa dang / /byang chub lam la brtson pa dang / /skye bo kun la phan mang mdzod/ /re ba thams cad myur du skongs/ /bdag gi yang dag bden tshig dang / /
bdag gis mi slu tshig smras pa/ /dbyangs can lha mo mchog gis ni/ /bdag gi don de grub par mdzod/ /lha mo 'dir ni gshegs par gsol/ /bdag gi tshig
la thogs med mdzod/ /lus dang ngag dang myur zhugs shing / /yid myur spobs pa rdzogs par mdzod/ /bdag gi lce yi dbang po la/ /bde gshegs spobs
pa ldan par mdzod/ /tshig gi gzi brjid mthu des ni/ /sems can thams cad 'dul bar mdzod/ /bdag gis tshig ni ci smras pa/ /don de thams cad grub
par shog /tshig la thams cad gus bskyed cing / /byed pa thams cad chud ma gzon/ /nam zhig bdag gi spobs 'dod pa/ /don de grub par ma gyur na/ /lha
mo khyod kyi bden tshig ni/ /thams cad brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga yi sdig bgyis pa/ /sangs rgyas bkas ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /gang yang dgra
bcom pa dag dang / /byas pa gzo ba'i tshig rnams dang / /shA ri'i bu dang maud gal dang / /bcom ldan 'khor gyi gtso bo ste/ /de la sogs pa'i bden tshig kyang / /thams
cad bdag la grub par shog /sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor rnams dang / /bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drang gi/ /bdag gi re ba bskang ba'i phyir/ /thams cad myur du
gshegs par mdzod/ /yang dag bden pa'i tshig gsol pa/ /thams cad slu ba med par shog /srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang / /gtsang ma'i gnas ni thams cad
dang | |tshangs pa tshangs chen mdun 'don dang / /tshangs pa'i rgyal 'khor thams cad dang / /stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang / /mi mjed 'jig rten gtso bo
dang | |de dang de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de kun deng 'dir spyan drangs te/ /thugs rjes bdag la dgongs mdzad cing / /brtse ba kun gyis gzung bar mdzod/ /
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag dang / /gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i lha dag dang / /byams pa mngon par 'tshang rgya'i gnas/ /dga' ldan gnas kyi lha rnams dang / /'thang
bral gyi ni lha rnams dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang / /rgyal chen bzhi yi lha rnams dang / /gzhan yang lha 'khor thams cad dang / /sa chu me rlung lha dag
@#/ /dang | |ri rab lhun la gnas pa dang / /chu bdun ri bo lha rnams dang / /de kun 'khor dang bcas pa dang / /zur phud lnga can nor rgyas
dang | |nyi zla gza' dang rgyu skar dang / /de la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / /'jig rten bde bar mdzad pa'i gnas/ /de la sogs pa'i lha thams cad/ /sdig pa'i
las la ma mos pha/ /sangs rgyas la gus 'byung ba'i ma/ /bu rab gzhon la byams pa dang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams/ /dri za dang ni lha ma yin/ /gzhan
yang mi'am ci dag dang / /lto 'phye che la sogs pa rnams/ /kun kyang bcom ldan mthu yis ni/ /bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drangs te/ /thugs rjes brtse ba'i
dgongs pa yis/ /bdag la thogs med spobs pa bskyed/ /lha dang mi rnams thams cad kyi/ /gzhan gyi sems rig mkhyen pa rnams/ /kun gyi mthu yis byin
brlabs shing / /bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig /ji snyed nam mkha' mtha' gtugs shing / /chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can de
dag thams cad kyis/ /bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig /de nas dbyangs can lha mo la bram ze kauN+Di n+yas de skad ces gsol pa dang / lha mos skyes bu chen
po de la dge'o zhes smras te/ gang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag 'chang zhing
'dzin pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste/ sems 'dun pas rjes su dmigs shing ci 'dod pa'i don cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
gzhan yang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu phra zhing zab pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa de bsam pa thams cad
myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems g.yeng bas byas pa ni ma gtogs so/ /de skad smras pa dang / bram ze kauN+Di n+ya rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te thal mo sbyar
ba byas nas rjes su 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/ lha mo/ khyod kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su srung
zhing yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad la chos 'di lta bu bstan pas bde ba dang / bsod nams dang / spobs pa tshad med pa
'phel bar 'gyur te/ gang sems bskyed pa rnams kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byas pa legs so/ /legs so/ /gser 'od
@#/ /dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das
la lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis ci nas kyang / chos smra ba'i dge slong de yo
byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / brel phongs pa ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems brtas pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde
bar gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur ba dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang / yi ge rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba
dang | rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag
gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di '+dzam+bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang /
sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i
bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur
ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ba/ 'di
lta ste/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / sman zong dang / yo byad dang / 'tshog chas kyi bye brag gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong
chos smra ba de spro par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+ya dang / gser gyi ri kha
dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ des da ltar phyogs gang dang / gang du sems pa dang / phyogs
gang dang / gang du lta ba dang / phyogs gang dang / gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang / der sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bde bar sbyar ba thams cad
@#/ /kyis bde bar 'gyur/ /zas dang / skom dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+ya dang /
dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le spram dang / yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi phongs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag yo byad thams cad
'byor par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bya/ /spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ lha mo
chen mo dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum brjod cing / de la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog kyang byin la ro sna tshogs kyang byin na de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po rnam
par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa yi bcud dag rnam par 'phel/ /lha rnams rtag tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /'bras bu lo tog
ldum sdong ljon shing rnams/ /lo tog shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang bskyed/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pa'i sems can de dag
la lha mo chen mo dpal ni sems par 'gyur/ /de dag la dpal chen por byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la legs
so zhes bka' stsal te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /lha mo/ khyod kyis sngon byas pa rjes su dran pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams
la phan pa dang / bde bas phan 'dogs shing mdo sde 'di'ang yongs su rgyas par byed pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas lha mo dpal chen mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ 'di nas byang phyogs su mi ring ba zhig na/ lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i pho brang lcang lo can gyi 'khor na skyed mos tshal dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog
'od ces bya ba na/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang bzang pad+ma dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na bdag gnas te/ mi gang la la zhig 'bru'i phung po spel
bar 'dod pa des/ rang gi khyim phyag dar legs par bya/ khrus legs par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ gos rab tu dri zhim par bgo bar bya'o/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal
@#/ /de la phyag 'tshal zhing mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi lag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ me tog
dang / bdug pa dang / spos kyang 'bul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i
tshig kyang brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal la yang mchod cing me tog dang / bdug pa'ang 'bul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus/ de'i tshe lha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po'ang 'phel par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo dpal
dgug par 'dod pa des rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
