pas dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu de dang / rkyen des bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes kyi/ bdag cag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs ga la ba der song
ste phyin nas de la mchod par bya'o snyam nas de nas lha'i bu khri po de dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur nas tshong dpon
@#/ /gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi khyim du lhags te de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs mal na nyal zhing 'dug pa de la lha'i bu de dag
gis mu tig gi se mo do khri ni mgo'i thad kar bzhag /mu tig gi se mo do khri ni rkang pa'i drung du bzhag /mu tig gi se mo do khri ni g.yas logs su bzhag/
mu tig gi se mo do khri ni g.yon logs su bzhag ste pus mo nub tsam du me tog man dA ra ba'i char chen po yang phab/ lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang dkrol/
nas des dzam+bu'i gling pa thams cad kyang sad/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyang sad do/ /de nas lha'i bu khri po de dag nam mkha' la dong ste lha'i bu
de dag rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul gyi gnas dang / gnas gzhan dag tu'ang me tog man dA ra ba'i char 'bebs shing nags khong khong na
yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der dong nas de dag gis rdzing chen po der me tog man dA ra ba'i char chen po mngon par phab ste de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas
slar yang lha'i gnas su dong ste de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' zhing rtse ste dga' mgur spyod cing dpal dang / skal ba bzang po
chen po dag kyang myong ngo / /dzam+bu'i gling du nam langs pa dang de nas rgyal po chen po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis skar mkhan dang / blon po chen po rnams
la smras pa/ ci'i phyir mdangs sum ltas 'di dag byung / de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyi
khyim du mu tig gi se mo do bzhi khri'i char bab cing me tog man dA ra ba'i char yang phab bo zhes byas pa dang / khyed dong la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la
snyan pa'i tshig gis bos shig /de nas skar mkhan dang / blon po chen po rnams chu 'bebs kyi khyim ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs
la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od khyod la 'bod do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs blon po rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po lha'i
dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ chu 'bebs/ mdangs sum de 'dra ba'i ltas byung ba 'di ci'i ltas shes sam/ de nas tshong
dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ bdag gis 'tshal te nya khri po de dag gum par gyur du nges so/ /
@#/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ji ltar shes/ chu 'bebs kyis smras pa/ lha/ chu'i gos rdzing der nya khri po de dag gum mam/ ma gum bltar
stsal to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis khye'u chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'brog khong khong
na yod pa'i rdzing gi nya khri po de dag shi'am/ ma shi ltos shig /de nas khye'u chu'i gos myur ba myur bar 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba
der song ba dang / nya khri po de dag shi ba'i dus byas par gyur cing me tog man dA ra ba'i char chen po bab pa'ang mthong nas slar logs te pha la smras pa/ nya rnams
gum par gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis khye'u chu'i gos la tshig de thos pa dang / rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song nas
de dag rgyus nas zhib tu smras te/ lha/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ nya khri po de dag thams cad ni gum par gyur nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams
kyi nang du skyes te de dag bdag gis mthus mdang sum de lta bu'i dge ba'i ltas de dag byung ste bdag gi khyim du'ang mu tig gi se mo do bzhi khri dang / lha'i
me tog man dA ra ba'i char yang phab po/ de nas rgyal po de dga' zhing mgu zhing dga' ste yi rangs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang
dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin
snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAkya lag na be con can de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur
to| |rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs
zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin gyi bu chu 'bebs
zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/ /
@#/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur
to| |sgra gcan zin ni de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chu'i gos zhes bya bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chu'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi
lha mo| |de'i tshe de'i dus na nya khri por gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi
gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri po 'di dag de'i tshe de'i dus na nya khrir gyur to/ /gang dag ngas chu dang / kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas
shing | rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i zab mo'i chos kyang bstan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pa ste dge ba'i las kyi rgyu des nga'i gan du 'dir lhags te des na de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu lung bstan te rab tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / gus par chos mnyan pas thams cad lung bstan pa thob par bya ba'i
ming thob par gyur to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na shing gi lha mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi lha mo/
khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na shing gi lha mor gyur to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ rnam grangs 'dis na 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe ngas ji ltar sems can mang po byang chub tu yongs su smin par
byas te de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i sa thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
po las/ chu 'bebs kyis gdul bya'i nya'i sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //bam po bcu pa/rigs kyi lha mo/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la phan
pa'i phyir lus kyang yongs su gtong ngo / /de ji lta zhe na/ dri ma med cing shin tu rgyas pa'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgya'i 'od zer snang ba dang / lha yul du rnam par 'phro ba thogs pa
med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis yongs su bskor te yul lnga len gyi ljongs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas
nags sna tshogs zhig tu byon pa dang / des der sngo zhing 'jam la mthing kar 'dug pa'i spang gi ngos la me tog dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sa phyogs shig
@#/ /gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ sa phyogs 'di ni mdzes pa
ste 'di na gtam gyi gnas kyi mtshan ma yod kyi/ da de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan things shig /de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du gtan bting
ngo| |gdan bting nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gdan bting lags na bcom ldan gtso bo mchog /mi la mchog stsol dam pa srid
bcings dkrol/ /bzhugs te mi la sman slad mthar bgyid kyi/ /bka' mchid dam pa bdud rtsi gsung du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs
nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed bya dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa rnams blta bar 'dod dam/ de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /drang srong dam pa sems can mchog gi snying po pa/ /bzod dang brtson
'grus che la zhi dang dul dga' zhing / /blo gros dran dga' yon tan dpag med gnas gyur gyi/ /rus pa bdag cag blta ba'i dus lags de legs shod/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi ri mo can dang / me tog ka ma la gsar du kha bye ba ltar 'jam pa'i phyag gis sa'i ngos la brdabs te bsnun ma thag
tu sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul las byas pa'i mchod rten zhig de nas byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ mchod rten 'di phye zhig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas mchod rten de phye ba dang / des der gser gyi 'od
'phro ba can gyi nor bu dang / mu tig gis khebs par g.yogs pa'i gser gyi za ma tog gcig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ gser gyi za ma tog dag cig mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ za ma tog bdun po 'di dag thams cad phye zhig /de bzhin du thams cad kha phye ba dang /
des der rus pa'i kha dog kha ba dang / me tog ku mu da 'dra ba dag gcig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rus pa
dag gcig gda'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ skyes bu chen po'i rus pa rnams khyer te shog /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rus pa de
@#/ /dag blangs te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rus pa rnams dge 'dun gyi mdun du bsnams te phyag
bzhes nas bka' stsal pa/ rus pa 'di dag yon tan mchog rab tshogs ldan blo gros mchog /dul dang bsam gtan bzod pa spro ba grags mchog dam pa ste/ /
blo gros ldan rnams phyir zhing rtag tu byang chub 'di la ni/ /spro brtan mos dang blo gros mchog tu sbyin la dga' bar byas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa tshul khrims dang / yon tan gyis yongs su bsgos pa/ mchog tu mthong bar dka' ba/
bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa rnams la phyag tshol cig /de nas dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te 'dun pa'i yid kyis rus pa rnams la phyag btsal to/ /de nas
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten thams
cad las mngon par 'phags pa sems can thams cad kyi phyag bgyis pa lags na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rus pa 'di dag la phyag bzhes/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ rus pa 'di dag gis nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /kun dga' bo/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba bzhon pa dang /
stobs du ma dang ldan pa/ thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa zhig byung ste de la bu lha gzhon nu dang 'dra ba gsum zhig yod de sgra chen po dang / lha
chen po dang / snying stobs chen po'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rtse ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang / gzhon nu de dag skyed mos tshal de'i yon tan la
chags shing me tog 'dod pas phan tshun du rgyu ste nags khrod chen po bcu gnyis su zhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu dag dong ba dang / gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams
kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas phan tshun du dong ste kun tu bsrungs pa'i skyed mos tshal chen po'i nags khrod bcu gnyis su zhugs so/ /de nas sgra chen pos nu bo gnyis
la smras pa/ kho bo'i snying la 'jigs pas non na 'dir bdag cag gcan gzan gyis bsad du 'ong gi tshur shog /lha chen pos smras pa/ bdag la 'jigs pa /
@#/ /ni ma mchis na skye bo sdug pa dang bral ba snyam bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to/ /snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ thub pas bsngags pa'i nags
khrod dben pa 'dir/ /bdag ni mi 'jigs mya ngan ma mchis kyi/ /shin tu rgyas mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste/ /bdag gi snying 'di rab tu dga' bar gyur//
de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag nags khrod bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyu ba na stag mo bu byung nas zhag drug gam/ zhag bdun zhig lon par gyur la
bu lngas bskor te bkres shing skom pas nyams su smad nas lus shin tu nyam chung bar gyur pa de 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sgra chen pos smras
pa| kye ma'o/ nyon mongs ma 'di bu byung nas zhag drug gam/ zhag bdun zhig lon par gyur la de ltar zas ma rnyed pas yang na ni rang gi bu la za bar 'gyur/
yang na ni bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ nyon mongs ma 'di'i zas ci/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ 'dir gang
sha sar pa dang / khrag dron mo yod na de ni stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / seng ge rnams kyi zas yin no zhes zer ro/ /lha chen pos smras pa/ 'dir nyon mongs
ma 'di bkres pa dang / skom pa dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad gcig lus te rab tu nyam chung ba 'dis gnas 'dir zas skom tshol ni mi
nus na 'di'i srog yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir su zhig rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar byed par 'gyur zhig gu /sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye/ rang gi lus yongs
su btang ba ni bya dka' ba'o/ /snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu srog dang / lus la mngon par chags pa blo chung ba rnams la ni tshul 'di bya
dka' ba lags kyi/ gzhan lus yongs su gtong ba la zhugs pa/ gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la ni bya dka' ba ma lags so/ /
yang | brtse ba'i snying rje las byung 'phags pa'i sems can dag /lha yul dang ni sa 'dir rang lus rnyed snyam ste/ /gzhan gyi srog phyir mthun pa'i dga' ba'i yid
kyis ni/ /'gyur ba med par 'dir ni rnam pa brgya yis gtse/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de shin tu mi dga' ste stag mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas
nas song ngo / /de nas snying stobs chen po 'di snyam du sems te da ni bdag gis lus 'di yongs su btang ba'i dus la bab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig cing 'gyes
@#/ /pa'i chos can mthar 'byed mthar ngan pa/ /rnag can lus 'di zas dang skom dang mal cha dang / /bzhon pa 'os pa chen po
dag gis ring bsrungs kyang / /sngar med rang gi rang bzhin mi 'dor byas don med/ /yang na thams cad du mi gtsang bar gyur pas na de'i 'tsho ba med
kyi| de bdag gis de las bzang po'i las la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de'i phyir bdag skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyur ro/ /
yang | snying po med lus dbu ba 'dra la srin bu brgyas gang byas pa chud gzon pa/ /'bras dang 'dra ba'i srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang phyi sas gang ba 'di
btang ste/ /mya ngan med cing 'gyur med phung med dri med bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis/ /kun tu gang ba'i chos sku yon tan brgyas gang rdul dang bral
ba thob par bya/ /de snying rje chen po mchog dang ldan pa'i snying du gyur pas de ltar btul nas khyed gnyis gshegs su gsol/ bdag ni rang gi bgyi ba zhig
gi slad du nags khrod chen po bcu gnyis su 'jug go zhes de gnyis bskrad do/ /de nas rgyal pu gzhon nu snying stobs chen po nags 'dab de nas slar log
ste stag gi gnas su song nas nags kyi yal ga la gos gzar te/ bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs pa med pa zhi ba thob 'dod de/ gzhan
gyis btang bar dka' ba'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i snying rjes sbyin/ /bdag gis skyon med byang chub ring med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par
shog |bdag gis srid ba'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'jigs las 'jig rten gsum po bsgral bar bya/ zhes smon lam btab bo/ /de nas snying stobs chen pos stag
mo'i mdun du nyal ba dang / de nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la stag mos ci'ang ma byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas/ kye ma'o/
'di ni nyam chung pas mi nus so snyam nas langs te/ snying brtse ba'i blo gros kyis mtshon cha btsal na gang nas kyang mtshon cha ma rnyed nas de nas 'od ma'i yal
ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te bdag gis mgul ba bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel to/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu chu'i dbus
su son pa'i gru rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /nyi ma'ang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med
@#/ /do| |lha'i spos dang / phye ma dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char yang bab bo/ /de nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub
sems dpa' la bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes sems can rnams khyab ste/ /mi yi dbang po rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'di
btang bas na/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi ba'i gnas kyi mchog /zhi ba gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dir ni tshegs med ring por mi thogs brnyes/
de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag gis sbags pa la bltas nas yud tsam gyis sha dang / khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig lus par
byas so/ /de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de la bsams nas lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ji ltar phyogs bcur rgya mtsho mthar thug rgya mtshor
bcas pa yi/ /sa 'di rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni med gyur la/ /me tog char pa 'bab cing kho po'i yid kyang 'khrugs pas na/ /da gzod bdag gi
nu bos rang gi lus ni btang yang dag /lha chen pos smras pa/ de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smra la/ /bkres dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyas gtses pa/ /shin
tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang / /za bar chas la lta bas bdag kyang dogs/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis rab tu mya ngan gyis non nas mchi mas mig gang ste lam
de nyid la slar log nas stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang / gos thams cad ni 'od ma'i yal ga dag la gzar/ rus pa rnams ni bye zhing bral/ khrag ni rdzab du
gyur| skra ni phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang brgyal te rus pa'i steng du 'gyel nas ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du shes
rnyed de langs nas lag pa bsgreng ste nyam thag pa'i sgra phyung ngo / /kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang / /de bzhin du ni bu la rab tu gdung ba'i ma/ /pad+ma
'dra ba'i mig ring khyod kyis gar bzhag ces/ /ma ni bdag cag la yang tha chung 'dri bar 'gyur/ /kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa phyogs 'di nyid du/ /shi na legs
kyi gson pa de lta ma yin no/ /snying stobs chen po med par gyur pas bdag cag la/ /pha ma dag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis snying
rje rje'i skad du rnam pa mang por dus nas dong ngo / /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang gzhon nu tshol zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams su rgyug pa dang / gcig
@#/ /gis gcig mthong nas/ gzhon nu ga re/ gzhon nu ga re zhes 'dri'o/ /de'i tshe btsun mo mal na nyal ba'i rmi lam na sdug pa dang bral
bar rmis pa la/ 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis bcad pa dang / so phyung ba dang / thi ba'i phrug gu skrag pa gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer bar rmis so/ /de nas
btsun mo sa g.yos pas snying dngangs te mod la sad nas sems pa la zhugs te/ 'byung po'i rten ma rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab g.yo ci zhig gu/ /nyi ma'i
'od zer med par gyur pas nga yi snying la mya ngan 'gyur ba ston/ /nga yi lus ni zhum zhing mig kyang g.yo la rang gi nu ma bcad rmis pa/ /nga yi bu rnams nags khrod
'dir ni rtser dong ba la dge bar 'gyur ram kye/ /de nas de snyam du bsams pa dang / bran mo'ang snying myos te 'ongs nas btsun mo la smras pa/ jo mo/ gzhon nu'i
rim gro pa dag gzhon nu tshol zhing mchis na jo bo stor ces gda'o/ /de skad ces thos ma thag tu btsun mo'i snying 'dar zhing mig dang / gdong mchi mas gang ste
rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha/ bdag gi bu sdug pa stor ces thos so/ /rgyal po'ang snying 'dar zhing shin tu myos te/ kyi hud/ bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral
ba lta zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/ nga gzhon nu btsal ba la nan tan du byed kyi bzang mo/ mya ngan ma byed cig /der gzhon nu tshol ba la
zhugs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs dag rong rong por gyur to/ /de nas ring po ma lon par rgyal pos rgyal bu gzhon nu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang
smras pa/ gzhon nu de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/ kyi hud/ bu dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal pa'o/ /ji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yid ni mi bde ba
mi rnams bu rnyed pa ni de ltar dga' ba ma yin no/ /'jig rten na ni gang dag bu med pa dang shi ba'am/ /mi rnams gang dag bu gson de dag bde ba yin nam ci/ /de nas
btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas rnga mo gnad du bsnun pa bzhin du shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra byung ngo / /de ltar bu gsum dag ni g.yog gi tshogs bcas te/ /me
tog rnams kyis gang ba'i nag khrod zhugs pa las/ /bdag gi bu dge tha chung 'ongs par ma gyur na/ /bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tha chung de ga re/ /de nas de gnyis
lhags pa dang / rgyal pos bu la dris pa/ khye'u tha chung ga re zhes gzhon nu gnyis la dris pa dang / de nas mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing mig mchi mas gang ste rkan dang /
@#/ /mchu dang / kha dang / so bskams nas cang mi zer ro/ /btsun mos smras pa/ kho mo'i bu sdug tha chung de ga re/ kho mo'i snying 'di gsal
thug gyur cing / /lus ni mi bzad rab tu gzir gyur te/ /kho mo'i dran pa nyams gyur myur du smros/ /de nas gzhon nu de gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de zhib tu
smras so/ /de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang / btsun mo myos bar gyur te myos pa sangs nas snying rje rje'i skad du ngu zhing phyogs der dong ngo / /de nas rgyal po dang /
btsun mos rus pa de dag sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa med cing / skra phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong nas shing rlung gis btab pa bzhin du
'gyel to/ /de nas mdun na 'don pa dang / blon po de dag de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas/ chu dang / ri ma la ya'i tsan+dan gyi lde gus rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i
lus sim par byas so/ /de nas ring zhig lon pa dang 'du shes rnyed nas rgyal po langs te snying rje rje'i skad du 'bod pa/ kyi hud bu sdug yid 'ong mthong
dga' ba/ /'chi bdag dbang du ci phyir myur du song / /'chi bdag ci phyir nga la sngar ma 'ongs/ /de la sdug bsngal 'di las gzhan mi 'byung / /btsun mo'ang myos
pa las sangs nas/ skra zhig cing lag pa gnyis kyis brang la brdungs te nya thang la phyung ba bzhin du sa'i steng du 'gre ldog cing ma he be'u stor ba dang / rnga mo rde'u
stor ba bzhin du snying rje rje'i skad du ngu'o/ /kyi hud sdug cing gces pa'i bu ni pad+ma 'di/ /su yis sa yi steng du bshig nas rab tu gtor/ /yid 'ong mig ldan zla
'dra'i bzhin can bdag gi bu/ /bdag gi dgra bo gang gi de ring sa 'dir bcom/ /kyi hud sa 'dir bu mchog bsad mthong ba/ /lus 'di ci phyir de ring zhig ma gyur/ /
sdug bsngal 'di 'dra mthong yang ma gas pa/ /bdag gi snying 'di lcags ni yin yang dag /de ring rmi lam du ni bdag gi nu ma 'ga' zhig gis ni ral gris bcad/ /so yang
phyung bas de ring bdag gi bu sdug de ni myur du ma rung gyur/ /bdag gis thi ba'i phru gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar khras khyer bzhin/ /bdag ni bu
gsum dag gis bskor ba las kyang gcig ni de ring 'chi bdag khyer/ /kyi hud sdig pa can gyi rmi lam de yi 'bras bu grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /de nas rgyal po dang
btsun mo snying rje rje'i skad du rnam pa mang po smre zhing rgyan thams cad bkrol nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas
@#/ /gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams sa phyogs 'dir bzhag go/ kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying stobs chen po zhes
bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying stobs
chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las yongs su ma grol ba de'i tshe'ang sems can dmyal ba la
sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las ngas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags nas skyon thams cad dang bral te yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa da ltar
lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar sems can re re'i phyir yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su bskal par gnas par spro zhing skye bo'i 'khor ba las
rnam par grol lo/ /sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /byang chub mchog 'di yongs su tshol ba na/ /bskal ba mang por ngas ni lus btang ste/ /ji
ltar rgyal po dang ni rgyal bur gyur/ /de ltar ngas ni lus rnams yongs su btang / /sngon gyi tshe rabs rnams ni rjes dran te/ /shing rta chen po zhes bya'i rgyal po
byung | |de la bu ni gtong ba che ldan pa/ /snying stobs che zhes bya ba dam pa yod/ /de la phu bo dag ni gnyis yod de/ /ming ni sgra chen po dang lha chen po/ /spun
tshogs de dag nags tshal khrod du dong / /de dag stag mo bkres pas gzir ba mthong / /de la sems can mchog de snying rje skyes/ /stag mo 'di ni bkres skom
gzir bas na/ /bdag bu de dag za bar 'gyur 'ong gi/ /de ltar bdag lus da ni btang bar bya/ /shing rta che la bu ni snying stobs che/ /stag mo bkres mthong
stag phrug rnams/ /thar bar bya phyir snying rje yis/ /ri ngos gzar ba mchongs pa dang / /sa ni ri dang bcas su g.yos/ /bya tshogs rnam mang rnam par 'thor/ /
ri dwags tshogs skrag 'jig rten 'di/ /mun pas thibs por gnas par gyur/ /de yi phu po sgra chen dang / /de bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis/ /nags tshogs
chen po der bltas na/ /snying stobs chen po ma rnyed nas/ /shin tu mya ngan zug rngu'i snying / /dran med nags kyi nang na rgyu/ /nu po de ni yongs tshol zhing / /
@#/ /gdong la mchi zag nags khrod rgyu/ /sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gnyis/ /stag mo
nyam chung gar nyal ba/ /der ni nye bar song ba dang / /stag mo dang ni stag phug gi/ /stag gi mchu la khrag chags mthong / /skra dang rus
pa cung zad cig /sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong / /de yi khrag gi thigs pa ni/ /nyung zhig sa la yod par gyur/ /rgyal po'i bu ni de gnyis
kyis| |khrag chags pa yi sa de mthong / /rab tu brgya la te sa 'di la/ /'gyel nas yid ni nyams par gyur/ /lus rnams la ni rdul gyi
gos| |dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos/ /de dag gi ni 'khor rnams kyang / /snying rjer ngu zhing mya ngan non/ /de dag chus ni rab
'thor zhing / /lag pa bsgreng ste du zhing gnas/ /de ni 'gyel ma thag tu yang / /btsun mo gces mchog bskyed pa'i ma/ /bud med dag ni
lnga brgya dang / /pho brang nang na der 'dug ba/ /nu sor gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas/ /'o ma khrag tu 'byung zhing 'dzag /de yi lus dang yan lag
kun| |khab kyis btsags pa bzhin du tsha/ /snying ni rab tu mya ngan gang / /bu bral mya ngan drag mangs phog /rgyal po'i gan du nyer song ste/ /mya ngan rab gdungs
yid mi dga'/ /snying rje'i sgra yis rab du zhing / /rgyal po shing rta che la smras/ /mi dbang rgyal po bdag la gson/ /bdag lus mya ngan ma yis tshig /
bdag gi nu sor rtse gnyis nas/ /'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung / /bdag lus khab kyis btsags bzhin tsha/ /bdag gi snying yang gsal thug /ji ltar
sdug pa'i bu rnams ni/ /phyin chad mi mthong 'di 'dra'i ltas/ /bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal/ /thugs rje mdzod de bdag srog stsol/ /de ring
bdag gi rmi lam na/ /thi ba'i phru gu gsum rnyed na/ /bdag gi thi ba'i phru gu ni/ /sdug cing yid 'ong gang lags pa/ /der ni khra mchis bdag gi ni/ /
thi ba phru gu da khras 'tshal/ /bdag gi rmi lam 'di 'dra yi/ /mya ngan snying 'dir rab tu zhugs/ /sems ni mya ngan rab gdungs pas/ /bdag ni ring por
mi thogs 'gum/ /bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal/ /thugs rjes ldan pa bdag srog rtsol/ /de skad smras nas btsun mo mchog /brgyal nas sa
@#/ /der 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /dran pa'i dbang po rnam par nyams/ /sems kyang stor cing dran pa med/ /btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs
thams cad kyang / /snying rje'i skad kyi rab tu du/ /btsun mo dam pa brgyal gyur te/ /sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni/ /de ma thag tu rgyal dbang ste/ /bu dang
bral ba'i mya ngan non/ /blon po dang ni 'khor rnams kyang / /gzhon nu rnams ni btsal phyir dong / /grong khyer kun gyi skye bo dag /tha dad khyim nas byung
zhing 'khod/ /du zhing gdong nas mchi ma zag /lam kar snying stobs che de 'dri/ /gson tam 'on te shi'am ci/ /snying stobs chen po de gar song / /
bdag cag de ring mthong zhig gam/ /yid 'ong sems can mthong re dga'/ /de ring mi snyan thos gyur cing / /yun ring mya ngan mi bzad rlung / /sgra mi
phyin cing rgyu mtha' yas/ /drag po'i sgra bcas ldang zhig gam/ /rgyal po shing rta che langs te/ /mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du/ /btsun mo dam pa
sar 'gyel la/ /bdag nyid chu yi rgyun kyang 'thor/ /ji srid dran rnyed ldan 'gyur ba/ /de srid du ni chu yis gtor/ /bdag bu gum mam gson
zhig ces/ /zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed/ /rgyal po shing rta chen po yis/ /btsun mo'i mchog la 'di skad smras/ /blon po dag dang 'khor rnams
kyang | |gzhon nu rnams ni chos phyir dong / /khyod ni rab tu yid zhum zhing / /rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed/ /de ltar shing rta chen po yis/ /btsun mo dam pa
spro bsrings te/ /rgyal po'i pho brang nang nas byung / /mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du/ /blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor te/ /yid ni rab zhum lus kyang zhan/
srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang / /ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin rgyug /rgyal bu rnams ni btsal ba'i phyir/ /grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung / /rgyal po
byung ba mthong nas ni/ /rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang / /rgyal po shing rta chen po ni/ /grong khyer nas byung de ma thag /sdug pa'i bu ni blta ba'i phyir/ /
rgod pa'i mig gis phyogs su bltas/ /mgo bregs yan lag khrag spags shing / /lus la rdul gyis gos gyur la/ /gdong la mchi zag ngu bzhin du/ /'ong
ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni/ /shing rta chen po'i snying la yang / /rab tu mi bzad mya ngan gnas/ /ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zag /lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug/
@#/ /de nas blon po gzhan zhig ni/ /rgyang ring myur du rings par 'ongs/ /'ongs nas mi dbang rgyal po ni/ /shing rta che la 'di
skad smras/ /mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig /khyod sras yid du 'ong bar mchis/ /ring po mi thogs khyod kyi gan 'dir ni/ /sras mchog yid
'ong mchi ba khyod kyis gzigs/ /rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang / /de nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs/ /rdul chags dri ma can gyi gos
gyon cing / /mchi ma'i gdong gis rgyal la 'di skad smras/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras gnyis ni/ /mya ngan me yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas/ /
rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog gcig mi gda'/ /snying stobs chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin/ /stag mo bu byung ring por ma lon pa/ /rang gi bu rnams za bar
'dod par mthong / /de dag la ni gzhon nu sems can chos/ /snying rje chen po ldan pas sems bskyed nas/ /byang chub de ni smon lam che btab pa/ /
sems can thams cad bdag gis dgrol bar bya/ /byang chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la/ /ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis reg par bya/ /sems can
chen po ri ngos gzar nas mchongs/ /stag mo bkres pas non pa de langs te/ /yud tsam gyis ni lus la sha med byas/ /rgyal po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tshe lus/ /ma
rungs pa yi tshig ni de thos nas/ /rgyal po shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te/ /sa la 'gyel nas sems kyang stor bar gyur/ /mya ngan me ni shin tu mi bzad
'bar/ /'khor dang blon pos snying rje'i skad kyis ni/ /ngu zhing mya ngan non bzhin de dag kyang / /chus 'thor lag pa bsgreng ste rab tu ngu / /blon po gsum
pas rgyal la smras pa ni/ /bdag gis de ring gzhon nu gnyis po dag /nags chen de na rab tu brgyal gyur te/ /sa la 'gyel te sems kyang stor mthong nas/
dran pa rnyed de langs kyi bar du ni/ /bdag cag rnams kyis chab kyis rab tu gtor/ /phyogs bzhi dag nas kun nas 'bar bar mthong / /yud tsam 'greng
nas slar yang sa la 'gyel/ /snying rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don/ /rtag par lag pa bsgreng ste gnas nas ni/ /nu bo de yi bsngags pa rab tu
brjod/ /rgyal po de ni rab tu sems zhum zhing / /bu dang phra bas na non nas sems kyang 'khrugs/ /mya ngan rab tu gdungs shing smre sngags 'don/ /rgyal
@#/ /po de ni 'di snyam yongs su sems/ /bdag bu sdug cing yid 'ong gcig po ni/ /sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin/ /bdag
gi bu ni gnyis po de dag kyang / /mya ngan me yis srog ni zad 'ong gi /'di ltar bdag nyid myur du deng song la/ /mthong na dga' ba'i bu dag blta bar bya/ /
bzhon pa mgyogs pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi/ /rgyal po'i khab tu myur du bkri bar bya/ /de dag rnams ni skyed pa'i ma yi snying / /mya ngan me yis gang bar 'gyur
du 'ongs/ /bu gnyis mthong nas zhi ba thob gyur to/ /srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas/ /glang chen zhon te bu
rnams blta phyir song / /bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis rab du zhing / /nub bo'i ming 'bod lam nas 'ong ba mthong / /rgyal pos bu de gnyis ni khrid nas su/ /rab tu du
zhing khyim du song nas ni/ /de yis skyen par la gor myur du yang / /btsun mo la ni rang gi bu rnams bstan/ /shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /sngon gyi rgyal po shing
rta chen po yi/ /bu de snying stobs chen po mchog gyur cing / /gang gis stag mo bde bar byas pa yin/ /rgyal po'i dbang po dam pa zas gtsang ni/ /shing rta che zhes bya ba'i rgyal por
por gyur/ /btsun mo'ang btsun mo dam pa sgyu 'phrul gyur/ /sgra chen po ni byams par gyur pa yin/ /rgyal po lha chen po yang de bzhin du/ /de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
yin| |stag mor gyur pa skye dgu'i bdag mo che/ /stag phrug dag ni dge slong lnga por gyur/ /de nas rgyal po shing rta chen po dang / btsun mos snying rje bar smre sngags rnam pa mang po bton
nas rgyan thams cad bkrol te skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas snying stobs chen po de'i rus pa 'di dag phyogs 'di nyid du bzhag ste rin
po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'di byas so/ /snying stobs chen po 'dis stag mo la lus yongs su btang nas lus yongs su btang ba 'dis phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bgrang ba
las shin tu 'das pa rnams su'ang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya'o zhes smon lam de skad btab bo/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang / mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can
grangs med pa dpag tu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /mchod rten 'di 'dir bstan pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin no/ /rkyen ni 'di yin no/ /mchod rten de'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin
gyis brlabs kyis sa de nyid kyi nang na zhugs so/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stag mo la lus yongs su btang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //
@#/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs
ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gis thal mo sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa gser
dang | rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal ba'i sku mdog gtso ma'i gser 'dra ste/ /
sku lus gser gyi mdog tu rnam par gda'/ /gser gyi ri dbang lta bur gser gyi mdog /thub pa pad+ma dkar po'i gser mdog can/ /bzang po'i mtshan gyis sku
lus rnam par brgyan/ /dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs sku lus spras/ /gser gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar/ /shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra/ /tshangs
pa'i sku dang sgra snyan tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /seng ge'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs/ /yan lag drug cu'i sgra bsgrags dri med sgra/ /rgyal dbyangs rma bya
ka la ping ka'i sgra/ /shin tu dri med dri bral gzi 'od mdzes/ /rgyal ba bsod nams brgya yi mtshan gyis brgyan/ /mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri med dri bral mchog /rgyal ba
yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra/ /sems can rnams la phan par thugs brtse'i mchog /'jig rten dag na ba de ba sbyin pa'i mchog /rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston
pa ste| |mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'dzud pa lags/ /'chi ba med pa'i bde ba gsol ba ste/ /rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu ston/ /'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer
'dzud pa ste/ /bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i gnas/ /rgyal ba 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thar bar mdzad/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skye dgu sgrol/ /zhi ba'i lam
la skye dgu rab tu 'dzud/ /skye dgu rnams la bde ba kun stsol ba/ /khyod la dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te/ /ji snyed 'dren pa'i ye shes yon tan mtsho/ /srog chags kun
la khyod kyi thugs rje dang / /byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang / /khyod kyi yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho las/ /bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang //
yon tan thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan pa/ /lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis/ /yon tan mtsho las yon tan thigs blangs te/ /de ltar bdag gis mdor
@#/ /bsdus cung zad bshad/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags de yis ni/ /sems can de dag byang chub mchog reg shog /gser 'od
dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas byang
chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la
ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /thub dbang khyod ni bsod nams brgya
pa'i mtshan/ /dpal stong mdzes pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /kha dog rgya chen mchog tu zhi ba ston/ /nyi ma stong ltar 'od ni rnam par 'phro/ /'od zer du ma
'bar bas 'od kyis khyab/ /kha dog sna tshogs gang bas rin chen 'dra/ /sngon po dkar po ser po baiDUR+ya/ /zangs dang skya reng shel gyi 'od lta bus/ /rdo rje ri
dbang ri rab thal mdzad cing / /zhing rnams bye ba du mar snang mdzad de/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po zhi bar mdzad/ /bde ba'i mchog gis sems can tshim par
mdzad/ /mdog dang dbang po gsal ba blta na mdzes/ /gzugs bltas mi ngoms skye bos blta na dga'/ /rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu skra rnam par mdzes/ /bung ba mang pos
gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra/ /thugs rjes rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /ting 'dzin byams pa bsod nams dam pa bsags/ /dpe byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs
ldan| |ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag yon tan brgyan/ /khyod ni rab tu tshim mdzad phan pa mdzad/ /bde mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas 'byung / /yon tan zab mo sna
tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /zhing rnams bye ba dag tu lhang nge ste/ /me yi 'od ltar 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i nyi dkyil rdzogs pa bzhin/ /ri
rab lta bur yon tan kun ldan par/ /'jig rten khams rnams kun tu rab tu gda'/ /ba zho ku mu da dang zla 'dra zhing / /kha ba'i mdog dang dkar po bzang 'dra ba'i//
tshems kyi phreng bas khyod kyi zhal mdzes pa/ /ngang pa'i rgyal pos bar snang ji bzhin no/ /khyod kyi zhi zhal mtshan gnas zla ba 'dra/ /g.yas su 'khyil cing khong chud 'dra
ba lags/ /bai DUR+ya 'dra'i spu 'od dkar rnams kyis/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na nyi ma lta bur mdzes/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin
@#/ /gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag
par bsdus pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ rnam par dag pa'i chos la spobs pa'i blo mnga' pa/ /las ngan lam dang bral
pa'i bdag nyid blo mnga' zhing / /srid dang srid min mkhyen pa'i rnam dag blo mnga' ba/ /sangs rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs
rgyas gzi brjid mtha' yas te/ /kye ma'o kye ma'o rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab 'dra/ /kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te/ /u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin
du shin tu dkon/ /sems can dag ni thams cad rjes su gzung slad du/ /gang gis mdo sde dam pa 'di 'dra rab gsungs pa/ /mi dbang nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po'i
rigs kyi tog /kye ma'o kye ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dbang po zhi/ /zhi ba dam pa zhi pa'i grong khyer rab tu
zhugs/ /ting 'dzin zab cing zhi la rdul dang bral ba ni/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas spyod yul der yang rab tu zhugs/ /de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa ste//
rkang gnyis dam pa rnams kyi gnas pa'ang stong pa lags/ /chos rnams de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong lags na/ /sems can rnams ni stong pa'i bdag nyid
ma 'tshal to/ /rtag par khor yug tu ni rgyal ba dran par bgyid/ /rgyal ba mthong bar yang ni rtag tu mya ngan bgyid/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma mthong bar bgyi slad
du| |rtag par yang ni smon lam rab tu 'debs par bgyid/ /bdag ni rtag tu dog sar pus mo btsugs nas su/ /rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis skom pas rab tu mya ngan
sems/ /'dren pa'i slad du snying rje'i skad kyis du bar bgyid/ /bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa mthong bar rab tu skom/ /mya ngan me yis kun tu rab tu 'bar bar
gyur| |mthong ba'i chu bsil bdag la rtag par stsal du gsol/ /bdag nyid khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas rab tu skom/ /thugs rje'i chab kyis bdag la rab tu tshim
par mdzad/ /'dren pa khyod ni bdag la thugs rjer mdzad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i gzugs mthong ba ni bdag la stsal du gsol/ /khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i
skyob pa ste/ /'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa lags/ /sems can thams cad dag ni rmi lam rang bzhin te/ /nam mkha' 'dra zhing nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid
@#/ /kyang lags/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu dang ni chu yi zla ba 'dra/ /'dren pa khyed kyi ston pa tshe dang ldan pa lags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las
bzhengs te tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo/ khyod legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod yang legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal nas/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa dang / lha mo chen po dbyangs can la sogs pa'i lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad dang / lha mo
chen mo dpal la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang / rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa'i rgyal po de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i
'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ mjug sdud kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //'phags pa gser
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dzi na mi tra dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus
chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya su bar+Na pra b+hA sot+ta ma sU tren+d+ra rA dza nA
ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po dang po/ 'das pa dang / ma
byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bya rgod phung po chos kyi dbyings/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas ni/ /dag cing rdul rnams
med pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams la/ /mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po ste/ /mnyan na shin tu zab pa dang / /yongs su brtags na zab pa nyid/ /gser 'od
dam pa 'di 'chad do/ /phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /byin gyi rlabs kyis byin brlabs pa/ /mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogs su/ /rin chen tog gis lho
phyogs su/ /'od dpag med kyis nub phyogs su/ /rnga sgra yis ni byang phyogs su/ /sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir/ /bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa/ /sdig pa'i
@#/ /las rnams zad byed pa/ /bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
gzhi| |dpal kun gyis ni legs brgyan pa/ /byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya/ /sems can gang dag dbang po nyams/ /tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang / /
phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang / /lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / /mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang / /bran bza' la sogs gtses pa dang / /phan
tshun mthun pa ma yin dang / /nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang / /mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang / /'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar
byad stems dang / /mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang / /mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi/ /rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang / /des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin/ /
mdo snga dam pa mnyan par bya/ /gang dag yid dge sems dwang zhing / /gos gtsang rnams kyis rab brgyan te/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /mdo sde
mnyan par byed na ni/ /mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags kun gyi gnad pa dang / /shin tu mi bzad 'di 'dra ba/ /de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur//
'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang / /blon po tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas/ /gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis/ /de dag la ni srung bar byed/ /lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang /
rany+dza nar gnas pa dang / /'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma dang / /sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang / /tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang / /klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni/ /
mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang / /de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang rnams/ /sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang / /bcas te de dag der lhags nas/ /nyin dang mtshan mo
mi g.yel bar/ /de dag la ni srung bar byed/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste/ /bskal ba bya bar rnyed dka' ba/ /mdo 'di rab tu
bshad par bya/ /gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang / /gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang / /gang su rjes su yi rang dang / /gang dag mchod pa byed pa rnams/ /de dag lha dang klu
dag dang / /mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang / /lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis/ /bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur/ /srog chags bsod nams med pa rnams/ /de dag
bsod nams phung po ni/ /mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang / /bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin zab mor
@#/ /sbyod pa yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / /rab tu gzung bar 'gyur pa yin/ /gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la/ /
dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing / /byams pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas/ /g.yel ba med par mchod par bya/ /rang gi sems ni dri med cing / /rgya che bar yang
rab byed la/ /sems kyang shin tu dwang byed kyis/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis/ /gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni/ /de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs/ /mi yi
srid pa legs par thob/ /'tsho ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang / /bshad pa 'di ni grag 'gyur ba/ /de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste//
sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ /gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // yang de'i
tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur
byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gro byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang / rkyen
gang gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste 'di ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas de'ang 'di snyam du sems te bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
'di skad du/ rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring par 'gyur te gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te
bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po nas srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi
bar du yang dag par blangs par gyur/ /zas dang / phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongs su btang ste tha na rang gi lus kyi sha dang / khrag dang / rus
ba dang / rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad na zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyam mo/ /de nas skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la
byed pa dag las 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na de'i khyim yangs shing rgya che la bai DUR+ya sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas spras pa/ de
bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba/ lha'i las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to/ /khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur te khri de
@#/ /dag las kyang lha'i ras bcos bu'i rin po che'i phrugs rnams bting ba dag byung bar gyur to/ /khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad+ma rin
po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo / /pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur te/ shar phyogs
nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung / lho phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung / nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med
byung | byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung ste seng ge'i khri de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i
khab kyi grong khyer chen po snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gla'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha'i me tog dag gi char yang bab/ lha'i sil
snyan gyi sgra'ang byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te
sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ sems can dmus long dag ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa dag ni
rna bas sgra rnams thos/ sems can smyos pa dag ni dran pa so sor rnyed/ sems can sems g.yeng ba dag ni sems mi g.yeng par gyur/ sems can sgren mo dag ni gos
bgos par gyur/ /sems can bkres pa dag ni lto 'grangs par gyur/ sems can sgom pa dag ni skom ngoms par gyur/ sems can nad kyis btab pa dag ni nad
dang bral bar gyur/ lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po rnams chang bar gyur te 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing
rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la bde sogs su thal mo sbyar par btu nas sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de dag rnams rjes su dran la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rjes su dran zhing bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad la the tshom za bar gyur
@#/ /te bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste sku tshe thung ba 'di ji lta bu 'di ci zhig snyam du bsam pa de sems shing
'dug par gyur to/ /de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung ngo snyam du ma sems shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas
pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i chod kyi mtha' phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du'ang rtogs par nus pa nged kyis su'ang ma mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams
dang | gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang / byang chub
sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhags so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshang bshad pa tshigs su bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyi/ /
thigs pa dag ni bgrang bar nus/ /shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/ /sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang / /phra rab rdul du bgrang bar nus/ /
shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/ /sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /sa la gang dag yod pa yi/ /rab tu phra rdul ji snyed pa/ /thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi/ /rgyal ba'i
sku tshe'i tshad mi nus/ /gal te la las nam mkha' la/ /sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang / /shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/ /sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs/ /bskal pa dag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa bye ba brgya dag ces/ /grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo / /gang phyir de yi rgyu dang ni/ /
@#/ /rkyen yang rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /sdig pa'i 'tshe ba spangs pa dang / /kha zas mang po byin pa ste/ /de phyir bdag nyid chen po de'i/ /sku tshe'i tshad
grangs mi rnyed do/ /bskal pa 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ /grangs med pa yang de bzhin te/ /de bas the tshom med par 'gyur/ /the tshom cung zad ma za zhig /rgyal pa'i sku tshe
tha ma yi/ /grangs ni gang du mi dmigs so/ /de nas de'i tshe 'khor der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kau D+Ni n+ya zhes bya ba dang / bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom
ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i sgra thos nas 'phral la 'dus te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal ta bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ phan par
bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la pha ma lta bu/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bur snang bar mdzad pa/ shes rab dang / ye shes chen po'i nyi
ma shar ba lta bu lags shing gal te khyod sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs na bdag la dam pa zhig stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor der lits+tsha bI gzhan nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas slob dpon
lung ston pa bram ze kauD+Ni n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci bram ze chen po/ khyod bcom ldan 'das la dam pa cig gsol lam/ bdag gis khyod la dam pa zhig sbyin no/ /
bram zes smras pa/ lits+tsha bI gzhon nu/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / ring bsrel gyi phye ma bgos pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel yungs 'bru
tsam la bsten par 'dod do/ /ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam de mngon par mched na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po 'ba' zhig thob ces grags so/ /kye
lits+tsha bI gzhon nu/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes par dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang /
yon tan dang ldan pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'chad ces grag gi nyon cig /kye lits+tsha bI gzhon nu/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo ni de ltar shes par dka' zhing rtogs par
dka' bas na kho bo cag mtha' 'khob kyi gling gi bram ze rnams ni gang bcangs pa na sems can rnams myur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po 'thob par 'gyur ba'i ring
@#/ /bsrel yungs 'bru tsam za ma tog gi nang du bcug la bcangs kyang rung ngo / /kye li ts+tsha ba'i gzhon nu/ khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa las ring
bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gsol nas ring bsrel za ma tog tu bcug ste bcangs pas sems can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam /
kye lits+tsha bi gzhon nu/ kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol to/ /de nas lits+tsha bI gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/ slob dpon lung ston pa
bram ze kauN+Di n+ya la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ nam zhig gang gla'i chu rgyun la/ /me tog rnams ni skye ba dang / /bya rog dmar po 'gyur ba dang //
khu byug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang / /'dzam bur ta la'i 'bru chags dang / /'bra gor a mra'i dogs pa chags/ /de yi tshe na yungs 'bru tsam/ /ring bsrel
du ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /nam zhig rus sbal spu rnams las/ /gos su legs par btags gyur te/ /dgun gyi grang ba sel byed pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel
yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig sbrang bu'i rkang lag las/ /yang thog legs par byas gyur te/ /brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yo ba/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par
'gyur/ /nam zhig srin bu pad+ma kun/ /so ni dkar po skyes gyur te/ /rno zhing chen por gyur pa na/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /mtho ris su ni 'dzeg
pa'i phyir/ /nam zhig ri bong rwa rnams las/ /skas ni legs par byas gyur pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig skas ni der 'dzegs te/ /byi
bas zla ba bza' ba dang / /sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang bu yis/ /nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs
te| |khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig bong bu bde 'gyur la/ /mchu dmar bim pa 'drar gyur cing / /
glu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams/ /dben par dong nas rtse ba dang / /phan tshun
mthun par gyur pa na/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /pa la sha yi lo ma rnams/ /rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te/ /char 'bab skyab
su nam gyur pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che/ /'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas/ /thang la byung ste
@#/ /'gro ba na/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis/ /ri po spos kyi ngad ldang ba/ /mchu
la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+yas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/
lits+tsha bI gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar smras pa/ legs so legs so gzhon nu
mchog /rgyal ba'i sras po tshig po che/ /dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa/ /lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa po/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa che ba nyid/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go rims bzhin/ /gzhon nu bdag las mnyan par gyis/ /sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi
khyab| |de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu zhi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'byung / /sangs rgyas thams
cad kha dog mtshungs/ /'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bcos ma min/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te/ /rdo rje lta bur sra
ba'i sku/ /sprul pa'i sku ni ston par mdzad/ /drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni/ /yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med/ /sku la rus pa khrag med na/ /ring bsrel yod
par ga la 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /thabs kyis ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa chos kyi dbyings/ /chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra/ /bdag gis 'di thos shes nas ni/ /bdag gis dam pa gsol bar byas/ /
de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir/ /gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis byas/ /de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo
de lta bu de dag thos nas thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de de dag yid kyis kun tu rtog pa rab tu dga' nas sgra
dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'/ /chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/ /sems can yongs su smin mdzad
phyir| |yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i
@#/ /phyir| |bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab
tu dga' ste dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa
'di bshad pa'i tshe sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o// //
de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na gser gyi rnga kun tu snang ba/ 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhig mthong
ngo| |phyogs thams cad na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na rin po che bai DUR+ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs
shing 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo / /de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rnga de
rdung ba mthong ste rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gnyid
sad ma thag tu bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag rjes su dran no/ /rjes su dran nas kyang de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po
nas byung ste srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug
nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis bcom ldan 'das ga ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgra las bstan pa'i tshigs su
bcad pa thos pa de dag gsol to/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rmi lam mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o// //nub
@#/ /gcig g.yel ba med par yang / /bdag gis rmi lam rmis pa ni/ /mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste/ /thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od//
nyi ma ji lta bzhin du 'bar/ /kun tu rnam par lhang nge ste/ /phyogs bcu rnams su snang bar gyur/ /kun tu rin chen shing drung na/ /rin chen bai DUR+ya dag gi/
khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te/ /brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi/ /'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong / /bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig /rnga chen
rab tu brdung ba mthong / /de yis de la brdungs pa dang / /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung / /gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni/ /stong gsum 'jig
rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang / /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar shog /rnga bo che yi sgra skad
'di yis ni/ /'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig /ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar/ /sems can 'jigs med 'jigs
dang bral bar shog /ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po/ /'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar/ /skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan
lag gi /yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur/ /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur/ /sangs rgyas
byang chub dam pa mchog reg shog /chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor gyur cig /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog /'gro la phan phyir chos
kyang ston gyur cig /nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig /sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas
te| |rus pa'i lus la me lce rab 'bar ba/ /de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig thos shog /sems can
kun gyis che rabs brgya dag dang / /skye ba stong phrag bye bar skye dran shog /thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cing / /de dag gi ni rgya chen gsung thos shog /
rnga po che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog /bya ba dge ba rnams
ni spyod gyur cig /mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyis/ /de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa/ /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /de dag
@#/ /rnams kyi de kun rdzogs gyur cig /sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes/ /lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar/ /
skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa/ /me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog /sems dmyal yi dwags mi yi 'jig rten na/ /sems
can sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po gang / /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog /rten med dpung gnyen
med pa dang / /skyabs med par yang gyur pa dag /de rnams la ni skyob pa dang / /dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig /sangs rgyas rkang
gnyis dam pa dag /thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs/ /gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol//
bdag gi sngon chad sdig pa'i las/ /shin tu mi bzad gang bgyis pa/ /stobs bcu'i spyan sngar bdag mchis te/ /de dag thams cad bshags par
bgyi| |pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang / /sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang / /dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas/ /sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis pa/ /
phyug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang / /rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang / /bzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis
dang | |nyes bsams nyes par smras pa dang / /nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang / /nyes pa'i dmigs su ma brtas pas/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang
bgyis dang / /byis pa'i blo yi 'jug pa dang / /mi shes mun pa'i sems dang ni/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang / /nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug
sems dang / /rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang / /mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang / /nor gyis mi chog nyes pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /
'phags min skye bo 'dre ba dang / /phrag dog ser sna'i sgyu dang ni/ /g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /phongs pa byung ba'i
dus kyi tshe/ /'dod pa rnams kyi 'jigs rgyu dang / /phyug po ma yin gyur pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /g.yo ba'i sems kyis dbang nyid
dang | |'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang / /bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang / /
@#/ /bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir/ /nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /lus
dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig /nyes par spyad pa rnam gsum bsags/ /'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags
so| |sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang / /de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang / /gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad
bdag 'chags so/ /gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang / /gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams//
de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /dam chos smra ba rnams la yang / /gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang / /chos la'ang gus par ma bgyis
pa| |de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas/ /dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang / /pha ma rnams la ma gus
dang | |de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /blun pa dang ni byis pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /nga rgyal dregs pas
bsgribs bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/ /stobs bcu rnams la mchod par bgyi/ /
bdag gis phyogs bcur sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal kun las 'don par bgyi/ /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun/ /sa bcu la ni dgod
par bgyi/ /sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang / /thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig /ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las/ /de kun thar bgyi nus srid
du| |sems can re re'i phyir yang ni/ /bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi/ /gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba/ /las rnams thams cad byang bgyid pa/ /
zab mo dag ni ston pa ni/ /sems can de dag bstan par bgyi/ /gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su/ /sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis/ /lan cig
rab tu bshags pa yis/ /de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ /gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams/ /myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba/ /gser 'od
dam pa dge ba yis/ /bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni/ /rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po/ /sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas
@#/ /yon tan snang bar bgyi/ /srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang / /yon tan rgya mtsho zab
mo dang / /sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyis/ /thams cad mkhyen du rdzogs par bgyi/ /ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang / /gzungs rnams
bsam gyis mi khyab dang / /dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gi/ /stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi/ /dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas
rnams/ /bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol/ /thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol/ /bdag gis bskal pa brgya
rnams su/ /sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ /de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems/ /phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir/ /sdig pa'i las la 'jigs
par bgyid/ /yid ni rtag tu dman par 'gyur/ /gang dang gang du spyod bgyid pa/ /bdag ni gang du'ang dga' ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thugs
rje ldan/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'jig sel bas/ /nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol/ /'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod/ /bdag gi nyon mongs las
rnams kyi/ /dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas sol/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni/ /snying rje'i chu yis bkru bar gsol/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags
par bgyi/ /sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang / /da ltar bdag gi sdig pa gang / /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /nongs par bgyis pa'i
las rnams kun/ /slan chad mi bgyid bsdam par bgyi/ /bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang / /sdig de bcab par mi bya'o/ /lus kyi las ni rnam
gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /lus kyis bgyis dang ngag
gi las/ /yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang / /las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /mi dge las bcu spangs
nas su/ /dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis pa/ /sa bcu la bdag gnas par bgyi/ /stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i las
gang dag /mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
@#/ /gang dag dang / /'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu/ /gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa/ /de dag kun la yi rang ngo / /
lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang / /bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa/ /bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ /byang chub mchog la reg par bgyi/ /
srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni/ /shin tu mi bzad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ /stobs bcu mi nyams spyan sngar mchis nas ni/ /sdig pa de kun so
sor bshags par bgyi/ /skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang / /'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga dang / /lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis//
bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chags so/ /byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang / /sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang / /srid pa nyam
nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang / /zhe sdang nyam nga gti mug nyam nga dang / /ngal ba'i nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang / /bsod nams bsgrubs pa nyam nga dag
gis kyang / /rgyal ba mi mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni/ /sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas gser mdog ri snang ri rab 'dra//
yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /gser mdog gser ni dri ma
med pa gser gyi 'od/ /dri med rnam dag bai DUR+ya yi yan lag spyan/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas/ /thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis
mun pa mun nag bsal/ /yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab/ /nyon mongs mes
gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra ba/ /thub pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad/ /mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes/ /
dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes/ /dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis/ /'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma
bzhin du bzhugs/ /dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai DUR+ya/ /skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar/ /'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna
tshogs legs brgyan pas/ /thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de bzhin mdzes/ /mya ngan 'khrug pa 'chi chu rgal ba'i dba' rlabs can/ /'khor ba'i klung chen phongs
@#/ /pa'i chu bor ltung ba la/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa/ /bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams
kyis skems/ /yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang / /ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog /rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag
rnams spras pa/ /sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang / /ji ltar sa la sa rdul mtha' yas dang / /ji ltar
ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang / /ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/ /sems can kun gyis
shes par mi nus so/ /bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni/ /yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nus so/ /chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang / /
rdor bcas ri bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni/ /bskal pa bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid/ /sangs rgyas yon tan pha mthar shes mi nus/ /yon tan kha dog snyan
dang grags pa dang / /dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang / /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa yis/ /sems can thams cad de 'drar 'gyur
bar shog /bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /'gro la phan phyir chos kyang bstan par bgyi/ /sems can sdug
bsngal mang gzir thar bar bgyi/ /stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal bar bgyi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar bgyi/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab
gnas par bgyi/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yis sems can tshim par bgyi/ /ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal bas rdzogs pa ltar/ /pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par bgyi/ /nyon
mongs gzhom zhing sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi bar bgyi/ /skye ba brgya dang skye ba bye ba stong / /bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran
par bgyi/ /thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran par bgyi/ /de yi gsung ni rgya chen thos par bgyi/ /bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas
'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi/ /dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyad par bgyi/ /zhing rnams kun na srog chags
thams cad kyang / /'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi gyur/ /sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams/ /de kun de'u re dbang po tshang par shog /gang dag
@#/ /nad btab nyam chung lus nyams dang / /phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams/ /de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig /nad med stobs
dang dbang po rnyed par shog /gang dag rgyal po chom rkun bred bsdigs bsad thug dang / /sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis phongs gyur pa/ /sems can nyam
thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun/ /'jigs mchog mi bzad brgya po de las thar gyur cig /gang dag brdegs shing bcing pas bcings gzir ba/ /phongs
pa sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cig /nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang / /'jigs pa mi bzad mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed/ /de dag thams cad bcings las grol gyur
cing | |brdeg pa dag ni brdeg las thar bar shog /bsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig /phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa med par shog /sems can gang
dag bkres sred skom gyis gzir/ /de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog /long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig /'on pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par
shog |gcer bu rnams kyi sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur/ /sems can dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog /nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis/ /sems can
thams cad bde dang ldan par shog /gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma gyur/ /sems can thams cad blta na sdug pa dang / /gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par
shog |rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig /yid kyis zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag /bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig /rdza rnga cang te'u pi wang sgra snyan dang / /chu
mig mtshe 'u dang rdzing bu lteng ka dang / /gser gyi pad+ma ut+pal pad+ma can/ /zas skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig /rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai DUR+ya/ /de dag bsams ma thag
tu grub gyur cig /'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung / /sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur/ /de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang / /phan tshun du
ni 'od byed gyur par shog /mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod/ /de dag gang du bsams par skye bar 'gyur/ /bsam pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang / /
bsod nams 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par shog /spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang / /gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dag /ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab
par shog /sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad dang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang //
@#/ /rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i chos la yang / /phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dman pa thams cad spong gyur cig/ mi
khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog /dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tu mthon po'i rigs su skye bar
shog| nor dang 'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig /snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis/ /bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog/ bud med
thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te/ /dpa' zhing rtul phod mkhas shing gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur/ /pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog/
phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung / /sangs rgyas bde bzhugs rin chen bai DUR+ya'i/ /khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de dag
thos 'gyur shog /bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni/ /srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa/ /sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa/ /de
dag thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig /sems can gang dag srid par bcings nas su/ /'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings pa/ /shes rab lag gis
bcings pa dkrol bar shog /sdug bsngal rnams las myur du thar gyur cig /sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang / /gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams ni/ /
bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams byed pa/ /de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo / /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yi/ /bdag gis rjes su yi rang bsod nams de/ /bdag
ni smon grub 'bras bu yod par shog/ byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig /gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang / /dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang / /yongs su bsngo ba
brjod pa 'di yis ni/ /bskal pa drug cur ngan song spong bar gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis/ /skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las/ /thal sbyar 'dug ste
rgyal ba gang bstod pa/ /tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan/ /bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan/ /mi dbang rgyal
pos rtag tu de mchod de/ /de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba/ /de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas
ma yin/ /gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la min/ /de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
@#/ /las| bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o// //'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa
chen po'i mdo/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i
tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad+ma'i 'byung gnas 'dis/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
dang | da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal ba gang dag sngar gyur gang byung dang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs pa/ /
rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod/ /thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam par dag /sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rab tu gda'/ /dbyangs rnams
kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung / /bung ba rma bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu/ /mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra/ /kha ba dung
ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems/ /rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'/ /spyan ni ring zhing mthon mthing dri ma med/ /ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra/ /ljags ni che zhing

legs la pad+ma'i mdog /pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra/ /zhal gyi mdzod spu pad+ma dung dang 'dra/ /baiDUR+ya yi mdog 'dra g.yas su 'khyil/ /thub pa'i zla ba phra zhing zla ba zad pa 'dra/ /sku
yi lte ba bung ba gsal ba bzhin/ /zhal mtho'i shangs ni rtag tu lhag ge ste/ /'jam zhing sa la'i gser ltar kha dog bzang / /rtag par rgyun du rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /ro mchog 'jam
zhing dam pa mchog rab 'phags/ /spu yi bu ga nas ni re re skyes/ /spu rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/ /mthon mthing 'od 'bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can/ /rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra
bar sngo la mdzes/ /bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang / /'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi/ /bde ba kun
gyi sems can rnams kyang tshim/ /sems dmyal 'gro dang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang / /yi dwags lha gnas mi yi 'gro rnams su/ /sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim/ /ngan song
'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi/ /kha dog mdog bzang gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /btso ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku/ /bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal/ /'dzum zhing rnam
mdzes shin tu dri med zhal/ /gzhon nu btsas 'drar sku lus yan lag 'jam/ /seng ge 'dra bar rtsal gyis gnon pa'i mchog /phyag ring phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste/ /sA la'i lcug ma
@#/ /rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ /'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtor/ /nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhag ge'o/ /thub pa'i dbang po'i sku mchog dri ma med/ /zhing
rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lhang nge bas/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang / /mtshan byad zla ba nyi ma mang po dag /de dag
thams cad 'od ni med par gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dag na/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong / /bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku/ /yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku/ /glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag /
phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med/ /sa yi steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed/ /phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed byung ba dang / /gang
dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang pa'i/ /ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang / /spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang / /dge ba'i
sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dger gyur ba/ /snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste/ /bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis/ /sangs
rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nus so/ /rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan rnams kyang ni/ /lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus/ /bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi/ /yon tan lce brgyas
brjod par ga la nus/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur te/ /srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba/ /skra yi rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyi/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi
