yon tan gcig la min/ /lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba yis/ /rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas/ /bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog bsags gang / /des
ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig /de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas/ /rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang //

gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na/ /rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga blta zhing / /der ni bshags pa 'di 'dra mnyan par bgyi/ /rgyal bstod pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba/ /skye ba de dang der ni rnyed
par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang / /gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba/ /de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan par bgyi/ /nyin gyur tshe yang de dag bshad
par bgyi/ /sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las thar bar bgyi/ /pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi/ /phyi nas byang chub bla med thob par bgyi/ /bdag gi zhing ni lhod pa med gyur
@#/ /cig /rnga phul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / /rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus/ /shAkya thub dbang mngon du blta bar bgyi/ /der ni bdag
gis lung bstan thob gyur cig /gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gser gyi 'od/ /bdag gi khye'u ni gang yin 'di gnyis kyang / /der ni bu pho de dag gnyi ga dang / /byang chub bla med lung
bstan thob par shog /sems can gang dag gnas dang rten med cing / /skyabs dang bral nas phongs par gyur pa dag /de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na/ /skyob dang dpung gnyen
skyabs dang rten gyur cig /sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig/ dge ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog /sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa/ /ma 'ongs bskal
par byang chub spyad par bgyi/ /gser 'od dam pa yi ni bshags pa yis/ /bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho bskams par shog /bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig/ bdag gi nyon
mongs rgya mtsho zad par shog /bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig /ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yi/ /bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag cing / /yon tan kun
gyi rgya mtshor gyur par shog /byang chub yon tan rin chen rdzogs gyur cig /gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /bdag gis bsod nams rab tu snang bar
shog |bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag gyur/ /ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yi/ /bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog /bsod nams snang ba lhag ger bya ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten
gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur cig /bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang / /bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis/ /ma 'ongs
bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi/ /'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs/ /de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba/ /yon tan
mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing / /ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa me tog pad+ma'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu/ /stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de/ /de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ /stong pa'i chos rnams
mdo tsam bshad pa yin/ /sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas/ /chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te/ /de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ /stong pa'i chos rnams
@#/ /mdo tsam rab tu bshad/ /sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang / /sems can 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang / /thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan
rnams kyis ni/ /mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do/ /lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te/ /dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra/ /de dag thams cad grong gcig
gnas mod kyi/ /de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so/ /mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug /rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod/ /sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams
'phrog /lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug /lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug /yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par spyod/ /dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du/ /rang rang yul
la rab tu 'jug par byed/ /sems ni sgyu ma lta bur g.yo ba yin/ /dbang po drug ni yul la rnam spyod de/ /ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang / /dmag dang chom rkun dag dang
gnas pa bzhin/ /ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing / /dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa/ /de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te/ /dbang po'i
spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang / /ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos/ /sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la/ /dbang
por bzhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar 'gyur/ /dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa/ /dbang po de ni shes par bdag nyid byed/ /lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med/ /snying po med
cing rkyen las byung ba yin/ /yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung / /grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas/ /sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni/ /gzhan du gnas te
phyogs dang phyogs na gnas/ /dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te/ /rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin/ /khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang / /gnyis ni
steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te/ /khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang / /
'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin/ /me yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang / /'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin/ /ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis/ /
sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong / /lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu/ /ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye/ /bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na/ /lus
ni gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang / /mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur/ /dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur/ /lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos/ /
@#/ /'di la sems can de bzhin gang zag dang / /chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste/ /ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/ /'byung ba chen po 'di dag che
'byung min/ /ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste/ /gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung ba/ /de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do/ /yod pa min zhing gzhar yang yod min la/ /ma
rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/ /ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te/ /de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do/ /'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang / /skye mched drug
dang reg dang tshor ba dang / /sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang / /skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /'khor ba'i 'khor
lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang / /tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang / /bdag gi lta bar gyur par bcad par gyis/ /ye shes
ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo grol/ /phung po'i gnas pa stong par gyur par ltos/ /byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis/ /ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phye/ /bdud rtsi khu
ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan/ /nga ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug /ngas ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim byas/ /ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs/ /ngas ni
chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus/ /ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas/ /ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab/ /ngas ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal/ /ngas ni chos kyi rgyal
mtshan dam pa bsgreng / /srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral/ /ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa/ /rten med
gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dang / /srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs zhi byas nas/ /bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas/ /gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon chad ngas/ /
'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas/ /chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na/ /brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de/ /lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang / /yan lag
mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang / /nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser/ /bai DUR+ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang / /stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang / /rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams
cad dang / /nags tshal dag dang sa las ni/ /skye ba thams cad bcad gtubs te/ /de dag thams cad phyir brlag nas/ /rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji
tsam par/ /phye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni/ /'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus/ /sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams/ /stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab
@#/ /pa| |sems can kun gyi shes pa gang / /de ni sems can gcig gir gyur/ /shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi/ /phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni/ /sems can kun
las rab 'phags pa/ /ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis/ /thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi/ /rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mi nus so/ /thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang / /skad cig
gcig la 'jug pa yang / /bskal pa bye ba du mar ni/ /gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya
ba ste drug pa'o// //de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen
po mig mi bzang rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod
pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags pa brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba rab
tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun
gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu bzlog pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza' thams
cad sel ba/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang / nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'joms
par bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ chos nyan
pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus 'di gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel par 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag
@#/ /gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang / mthu'ang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang de dag gi lus la 'jug
par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
cag ni chos kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o/ /'byung
po'i tshogs mi bzad pa snying rje ma mchis pa gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin
gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun du lha'i mig rnam par dag pa/ mi las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams
cad la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes ming
du chags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i gnod pa'am/ nad kyi
gnod pa'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgyad dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa brgya phrag stong dag gis gtses par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po
bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul ba bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po
bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bkur pa na/ yul gang dang / gang du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de
dang | de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgyad dang / gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan te thos nas/ mdo sde'i
dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/
@#/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po'i yul de thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung
bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal
pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la/ bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang / yo
byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ mdo
sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bsti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de
la rgyal po thams cad bas ches bsti stang du bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim gror bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste yul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin te rgyal po chen po dag/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod yang legs so// legs so// 'di
lta ste| khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa chos dang ldan pa/
chos smra ba chos kyis lha dang / mi rnams kyi rgyal po byas pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ khyod ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang / byams pa'i
sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde
ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed par
brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur
bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
@#/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi tshul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su gzung bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas
rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi lha dang / lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin rnams
pham par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/
dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa/ de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang /
zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal
po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ grong ngam/ grong
khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang / gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das/ ri'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis/ rgyal po bgyid cing rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa
de dag la yang bsti stang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod de rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i
chu chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / g.yog rnams dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar
'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel
bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang / g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/
@#/ /da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na/ gser 'od dam pa
mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod
pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar
bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su
bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /yul de dag kyang 'jig pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar
bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid
pa dang | mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag
dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'od
dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na'ang yul 'khrug
par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang / nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin pa na/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo / /btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das/ dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan
lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te der mchi bar bgyi'o//
@#/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de yul du zhugs pa las kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o/ /brel ba rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /
bgegs kyang bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid par lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs med pa
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang /
chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag
kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /
yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad la yongs su thar bar gyis shig /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog cig /'dzam bu'i gling thams cad
na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang / mtshang mi 'dru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig /rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed
bzhi'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des
mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po
thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam bu'i gling
'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan
tshun du mi 'thab mtshang mi 'dru mi rtsod mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi 'dzam bu'i gling
@#/ /'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang / mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa'ang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus
dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo khyud kor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'ang nyin mtshan du legs
par rgyu par 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun yang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang / 'bru thams cad 'byor
par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang / ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris
kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag/ gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la
gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur te/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong dam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo
sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin stong
phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu ni klung chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di
dag tshim par 'gyur ro/ /khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel lo/ /khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang bskyed do/ /khyed kyi gzi brjid
dang | dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel lo/ /mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la
yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la'ang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /des na mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par
'gyur ro/ /des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs
su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par
@#/ /'gyur/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par
'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa
dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur/ gnod pa med
par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang de dag gis
'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan par 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag
nyid la'ang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la
yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par
du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ tshe 'di la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po
nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal
bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba ma
mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas
pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyid de mnyan par bgyi'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan
pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o/ /der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag gdab cing
@#/ /me tog sil ma sna tshogs dgram par bgyi'o/ /spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par
brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o/ /phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar
bgyi'o/ /gos dri rab tu bda' ba gos sar pa mdzes pa bgos nas rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o/ /bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyi ste/ stan de la
mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o/ /der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o/ /rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam
par spangs pa'i sems kyis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/ /dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/ /
mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang / phan
pas blta bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad
la 'ang tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o/ /chos nyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par
bgyi'o/ /dga' ba dang / bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o/ /dbang po bde bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o/ /bdag dga' ba chen pos
dga' bar bgyi'o/ /rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o/ /spud pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs
par brgyan par bya'o/ /gdugs dkar po'ang gzung bar bya'o/ /rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho
brang de nas byung la chos smra ba bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor
ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang
@#/ /phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal med khang
rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che zhing rgya che ba brgya stong phrag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po
thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod
pa shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang / mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che
zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang /
kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/
bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu dag mthong nas/ mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad
tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /'di snyam du'ang de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o/ /deng bdag gis chos nyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
phyir mi ldog par bya'o/ /deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang /
dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun bcad par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba
@#/ /khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa
dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag
gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/ deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs
thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags
pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis yul 'di thams cad kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang /
pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po dang / dge slong
ngam| dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa 'di lta bus bsti
byed| bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po/ khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma
dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po
bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dpal dang / phun sum tshogs
pa dang / gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang mthun pas shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka'
stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos
la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
@#/ /'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod pa bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po/ bdag cag gi slad du rgyal po'i pho
brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos nyan pa de
nyan cing bdag dang / lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa bar shas cung zad cig sbyin pa bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma
thag tu mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de
dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing
dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des bdag
cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi
bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod
sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang /

'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag gi rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/
spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang
ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des gnas thams cad snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag
@#/ /gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag/ mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gi bdugs ma thag tu lag na spos snod gcig thogs pa de las spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur
te| de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho
chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i
bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na lha dang /
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar
snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po'ang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha
dog lta bu'i snang ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag/ 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo
sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi
mthus spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang+gA'i
klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi
steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la spos
@#/ /dang / bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi
zhing bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag/ cho 'phrul de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs
pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa legs so/ /legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ khyod
gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par
rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can
de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la
rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub
sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// //'phags pa gser
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang
gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshig gcig dang /
ngag gcig dang / sgra skad gcig gis dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi
snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad
par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod byang chub kyi snying po legs par brgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod stong gsum gyi
@#/ /stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste bdud kyi sde
bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod
byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med pa rab tu zhi ba rdul dang bral ba zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa bla na
med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa rdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud
par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod chos kyi sgron me bla na med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes
bu dam pa/ khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra stong phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod
sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong phrag du ma dag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed
par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal
po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
pa| bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin par mthong nas snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung
dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma
thag tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis pa legs par phyag dar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs
@#/ /par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /mi mjed kyi
bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod
sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis
legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad mthun par bgyis te mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba 'thob
par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos kyi bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su
bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de'ang kun
tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o//
yul de'ang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig
mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po de dge slong dang / dge slong
ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gro mi bgyid/ mchod
pa mi bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma chos nyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim
@#/ /gro mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi'ang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / stobs kyang mi bskyed/
bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa'ang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid do/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi
dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
gis yul de yal bar bor na yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lha rnams kyis yul
de yal bar bar bor na yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can
thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang / mtshang 'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ rdzogs pa dang / 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul
du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba
de'ang nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang / nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang / zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa'ang rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod
pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa'ang sgra 'byin par grag par
'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char drag po 'bab par 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms
par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / yul na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu rnams kyis yul de yal bar
bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sna tshogs stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la la zhig mi'i
rgyal por gyur la/ de bdag nyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /bde ba thams
@#/ /cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar
'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul thams cad yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid
bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
nam| dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la'ang bsti stang bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gro bgyi/ mchod pa bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi
dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus
'di dag gi gzi chen po'ang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo
sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs
ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis
sems can dag gi don gyi slad du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag las ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags
pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya phrag stong de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong thams cad pas ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can
rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par bshad pa lags so/ /ji ltar na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rang gi yul kun tu bsrungs bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyangs bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad na
@#/ /gnod pa dang / dgram mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul de
dag na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar
mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron me chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar lha'i khang khyim thams cad
lha dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma
dang | 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po
rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la
gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad lo legs shing nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang /
mis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar
sems can thams cad bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang
lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de lta na
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs
rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na
med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling
@#/ /'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /mi'i rgyal po'i dgongs pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag
'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nye bar bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad
do| |btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu de dang / rkyen des mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par
bgyi| gus par rim gror bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim
gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba cher gyis shig /rgyal po chen po dang / dge slong dam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig dang / de dag lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs
rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdo
sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bsrung ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems
bde bar 'gyur zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab par bya/ yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su
'gyur bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang
stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgros nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i
@#/ /tshe mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal ba zla ba dri
ma med pa'i sku/ /rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od/ /rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan/ /rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshoms/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho
lta bu ste/ /rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang / /ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang / /rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor
lor bris pa ste/ /khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong / /phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste/ /zhabs kyi dra ba ngang pa'i dbang po bzhin/ /gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu
gda'/ /rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang po/ /yon tan thams cad ri rab 'dra ba ste/ /sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nya ba
'dra| |nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chags med pa/ /rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal
po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu dag gi gser 'od dam pa yi/ /mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di/ /'jig rten skyong
khyed cag rnams kyis ni/ /brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya/ /'di ltar mdo sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di/ /sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa/ /sems can rnams
la phan dang bde ba'i phyir/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi/ /'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang / /sems
can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi ni/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o/ /gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di na yang / /'dzam bu'i gling gnas rgyal po thams cad
kyis| |rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni/ /chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar gyis/ /gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang / /shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dga'
'gyur zhing / /'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang / /sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis/ /'di ni mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni/ /yul na dga' dang bdag
bde dga' ba dang / /rgyal srid rnam par 'byor ba dga' ba des/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya/ /pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad byed pa/ /pha rol dgra tshogs zlog
pa dge byed pa/ /mchog tu 'jigs pas phongs pa sel byed pa/ /mchog tu dge byed mdo sde'i dbang po 'di'o/ /ji ltar rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa/ /yon tan kun 'byung
@#/ /khyim na yod pa ltar/ /rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang / /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta/ /ji ltar chu grang skom pa sel
byed pa/ /tshabs nyam thag tshe na rnyed pa ltar/ /yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la/ /mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ /ji ltar rin chen thams cad
'byung ba'i gnas/ /rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar/ /mi yi dbang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog /mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/ /'di ni lha
yi tshogs kyi mngon mchod pa/ /mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pa/ /'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po la/ /bzhi po dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin/ /phyogs
bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs/ /mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes
brjod pa byin/ /gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis/ /phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed/ /rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis/ /mdo sde'i dbang
po 'di ni nyan par byed/ /'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi/ /lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas/ /mdo
sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/ /chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni/ /gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob/ /gzi brjid chen po yi ni lha yi lus/ /shin
tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du
byung bar gyur dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig dus nas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'dar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / bde ba
dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis gtor mngon par gtor to/ /gtor/ mngon
par gtor nas kyang stan las langs te gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po chen po re re'ang gnod sbyin lnga
brgya lnga brgya dang / chos smra ba de bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
@#/ /po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// //de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis gos phrag pa
gcig tu bgos te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ /gzungs kyang
stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gi brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi/ dge slong chos smra ba de la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po bgyi'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po 'di las tshig gam/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag cig yongs su nyams par gyur tam/ bskyud na bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang /
yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du gser
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa
mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la
tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna
tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang /
bskyud pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du sngags dang / sman
dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug long dang / khrag khrug
dang | rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal
ba'i sman dang / sngags ni 'di dag ste/ shu dag gi wang 'u su dang / /sha myang sha mi shi ri sha/ dbang po'i lag dang skal ba che/ /dz+nya ma shing tsha a ga ru/ /shi ri be sta sra rtsi
@#/ /dang | |gu gul ras shA li ki/ /rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang / /tsan+dan dang ni ldong ros dang / /gi wang bcas dang ru rta dang / /gur gum gla sgang yungs
kar dang / /spyi mo sug smel na la da/ /nA ga ge sar u shi ra/ /'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas/ /skar ma rgyal la btags par bgyi/ /phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di/ /
lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi/ /tad ya thA/ su kr-i te kraM ta ka ma la nI la dzi na ka ra te/ haM ka rA te/ in+d+ra dza li/ sha kad dre ba shad dre/ a brta ka si ke /na ku tra ku/
ka bi la ka bi la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ san d+hi d+hu d+hu ma ma ba ti/ shi ri shi ri/ sa t+ya s+thi te swA hA/ lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni/ /me tog sil ma dgram par bgyi/ /
gser gyi snod dang dngul snod du/ /mngar ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi/ /skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni/ /bzhi zhig der yang gzhag par bgyi/ /rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo
bzhi| |bum pa thogs pa bzhag par bgyi/ /rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi/ /sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis/ /lha mo de ni
legs par brgyan/ /bar bar dag tu me long gzhag /mda' dar mdung rtse rna brang gzhag /de nas mtshams kyang gcad par bgyi/ /de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam/ /
sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis/ /mtshams bcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ a ra ke/ na ya ne/ hi le/ mi le/ gi le/ khi khi le swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi snam logs su khrus bgyis nas sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na khrus kyi zhi bar sbyor ro/ /tad ya thA/ sa ga Te/ bi ga De/ bi ga ta ba ti swAhA/ phyogs bzhi dag na
gang gnas pa'i/ /rgyu skar dag gis tshe srungs shig /btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / /phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang / /'byung po'i khams rnams 'khrug bgyid pa//
'jigs pa mi bzad zhi gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ sha me/ bi sha me swAhA/ sa ga Te/ bi ga Te swAhA/ su kha ti na te swAhA/ sA ga ra saM b+hU tA ya swAhA/ skan d+ha ma tA ya swAhA/ nI la kaN+DA ya

swAhA| a pa ra dzi ta bIR+ya ya swAhA/ hi ma ba ta saM b+hU tA ya swAhA/ a ni mi la bka trA ya swAhA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma Ne/ na maHsa ra swa t+ye de byai sid+h+yaM tu man+t+ra pa dang / daM bah+ma a nu ma
n+ya tu swA hA/ dge slong chos smra ba do bsrung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag gi don gyi slad du khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchis bar bgyi'o/ /lha'i
tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar dge slong ngam/ dge slong
@#/ /ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge ba snyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las 'byung
ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar gza' dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi
gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod
skye bo mang po phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod kyis sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /
zhes bya ba byin no/ /lha mo dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di
n+yas lha mo dbyangs can de bkug go /lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che/ /'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tan che/ /rtser gnas mdzes ma
dang ba rtswa yi gos bskus pa/ /dwang ba rtswa yi gos gyon rkang pa gcig gis gnas/ /lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad ces smras te/ /sems can rnams la dge ba'i tshig
shod lce khrol cig /s+yAd ya the dan/ mu re/ tsi re/ a ba dze/ a pa dza ba te/ hi phu le/ mi gu le/ pi ga la ba ti/ ma gu she/ /ma ri tsi/ sa ma ti/ da sha ma ti/ a gri ma gri/

ta ra| tsi ha ra/ tsa pa ti/ tsi tsi ri/ shi ri mi ri/ ma ri tsi/ pra Na ye/ lo ka dz+ye Sh+The/ lo ka shriSh+Tha/ lo ka pri ye/ sid d+hi pre te/ bi ma mu khi shu tsi kha re/ a pra ti ha te/ a pra te ha
te| bud d+he/ na mu tsi/ na mu tsi/ ma hA de bI pra ti gr-ih+na na ma ska raM/ bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig /bstan bcos dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyud dang / sde snod
dang | snyan dngags la sogs pa bdag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha bA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can
gyi mthus bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ ka ra Te ke yU re/ ke yU ra ba ti/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ hi li hi li/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang /
dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o/ /gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang / bden
@#/ /pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan
'das ma lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bra ma ze kauN+Di n+yas lha mo
chen mo dbyangs can la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyan par gyis/ /lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas
pa'i 'jig rten na/ /bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gi rab gang yin/ /lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod/ /yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas
yan lag brgyan/ /dbyangs can zhes bya spyan ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar/ /dri med ye shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par rgyas/ /rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta
bu blta ba'i phyir/ /mchog rab ngag gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do/ /dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang / /yang dag bsngags dang yon tan byed pa dang / /dri
med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang / mig mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang / /dge ba'i gnas dang dge ba mthong ba dang / /yon tan bsam du med pas brgyan pa dang / /
zla ba 'dra dang dri ma med 'od dang / /ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang / /seng ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang / lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang / /zla ba nya ba lta bur
snang ba dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs snyan dang / /shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang / /dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang / /lha dang lha min dbang pos
mchod pa dang / /lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang / /'byung po'i tshogs kyi gnas rtag mchog pa'i phyir swAhA/ /bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o/ /bdag la yon
tan khyad par kun stsol cig /dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub stsol/ /dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu srungs/ /yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni/ /nang par
langs nas gtsang mar brjod par bya/ /bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad rnyed/ /dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
po las/ dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad cas gsol to/ /btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis kyang / ci nas chos smra ba'i dge slong de yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / brel phongs ma mchis
@#/ /pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems brtas par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde bar gdugs mchan bas par 'gyur ba dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo
sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang / yi ge rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ba
dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i
gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par
'gyur ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo legs par
'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs
pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
dang | gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu chad par 'gyur ba gang 'di gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang /
'tshog chas gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan
rgya mtsho bai DUR+ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ de da ltar phyogs gang dang / gang
du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang / gang du lta ba dang / phyogs gang dang / gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang / der sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag bde
bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas dang / skom dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+ya dang /
dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi phongs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag yo byad thams cad kyang
'byor par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bya/ spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa'ang dbul bar bya/ lha mo chen mo
@#/ /dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum brjod cing de la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog kyang byin la ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang byin na de'i 'bru'i phung
po chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa yi bcud dag rnam par 'phel/ /lha rnams rtag par rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /'bras
bu lo tog ldum sdong ljon lha rnams/ /lo tog shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang bskyed/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pa'i sems can de
dag la lha mo chen mo dpal sems par 'gyur/ /de dag la dpal chen por byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo dpal ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na skyed mos tshal
dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ba na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na gnas te/ mi gang la la 'bru'i
phung po spel bar 'dod pa des rang gi khyim phyag dar legs par bya/ khrus legs par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ gos dri rab tu zhim pa bgo bar
bya'o| |de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+ya dang / gser gyi kha dog bzang po gser
du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi lag nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par byed/ me tog dang / bdug
pa dang / spos kyang dbul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang dbul/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod/ lha
mo chen mo dpal la'ang mchod cing me tog dang / 'dug pa'ang 'bul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus/
de'i tshe lha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po'ang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo dpal dgug par 'dod pa des rig pa'i
gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag la phyag btsal nas/ rig pa 'di dag la
sbyor bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'di rnams bdag la 'byor par gyur cig/ s+yA da ya the dan/ pra ti pU ra Na bA re/ sa man+ta dar sha ne/ mahA bi ha ra ga te/ sa man+ta/ be da
@#/ /na ga te/ ma hA kA R+yaM pra ti pra ba Ne/ sa twa ar+tha sa maM tA nu pra pU re/ A yA na d+harma tA ma hA b+ho gi ne/ ma hA mai tre u pa saM hi te/ he te Shi/ saM gra hi te ta sa
mar thA nu pA lA ni/ 'di dag ni spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig gcig tu de kho na yang dag par sgrub par sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig ste/
sems can bar ma la sbyor ba rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gis lo bdun du 'don cing 'dzin pa dag yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen par gnas pa la
bsnyen te/ bdag dang / sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir snga dro dang / phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang / spos
rnams kyis mchod nas/ des bdag gi bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig /myur du 'byor par gyur cig /gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/
khyim de shin tu gtsang mar byas la lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa'ang dbul bar bya/ stan gtsang ma'ang gding bar bya'o/ /sa la me tog sil
ma bkram nas bsdad par bya'o/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la dpal 'ongs nas der gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de phyin cad khyim mam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal
lam| gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su nam yang brel cing phongs pa med par byed do/ /'gron bu dang / gser dang / rin po che dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / yo byad
thams cad 'byor pa dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de dag thams cad las lha mo chen mo dpal la shas kyi mchog
sbyin par bya ste/ des na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de na gnas par 'gyur/ phongs par mi 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gser
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 'bar ba rin chen gser gyi 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser du snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshal
@#/ /lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen mo la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam
pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu du zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags
zhes bya ba dang / shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba dang / nub phyogs
na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba dang / byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba ste/ su gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
'di las de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di dag 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ khong du chud par byed na de rtag tu tshe rabs dran par
'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
'di da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor gang du gnas
par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der/ btsun pa bcom ldan
'das/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad
par 'gyur ba dang / sa phyogs gang dang / gang na dge slong chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri shom par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang / gang du chos smra ba de stan la mchis nas gser
'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag sa phyogs de
dang | de nyid du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /lus 'di mi gda' bar chos kyi khri'i 'og logs su mchis te/ yan lag gi dam pa mgos dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang mthil
nas brten par bgyi'o/ /bdag kyang chos mnyan pa dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yang dag par mchod par
@#/ /bgyi'o/ /bdag tshim par 'gyur/ rim gro bgyi ba bgyis par gyur/ rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sa'i phung po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu
rtsa brgyad po 'di nas sa'i gzhi rdo rje la thug pa'i bar du sa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /steng
du'ang rgya mtsho'i mtha' la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di sa'i bcud kyi snum gyis brlan par bgyi'o/ /sa chen po 'di rab tu mdangs dang ldan par bgyi'o/ /des na
