nas rgyal po rtse ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang / gzhon nu de dag skyed mos tshal de'i yon tan la chags shing me tog 'dod pas phan tshun rgyu ste nags stug po
chen po bcu gnyis su zhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po'i bu dag dong ba dang gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas phan tshun dong ste kun tu bsrungs pa'i skyed mos tshal
chen po'i nags stug po bcu gnyis su zhugs so/ /de nas sgra chen pos nu po gnyis la stsal ba/ kho bo'i snying 'jigs pas non na 'dir bdag cag gcan gzan gyis bsad du
'ong gi tshur shog/ lha chen pos smras pa/ bdag la 'jigs pa ni ma mchis na/ skye bo sdug pa dang bral ba snyam bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to/ /sems can chen pos smras pa/ thub
@#/ /pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod dben pa 'dir/ /bdag ni mi 'jigs mya ngan ma mchis kyi/ /shin tu rgyas mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste/ /bdag gi
snying 'di rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag nags stug po bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyu ba na stag mo bu byung nas zhag bdun lon pa zhig bu lngas bskor
te bkres shing skom pa'i nyam smad nas lus mchog tu nyam chung bar gyur pa de 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye ma'o/ /nyon mongs ma 'di bu byung nas
zhag drug gam/ zhag bdun lon par gyur la da ltar zas ma rnyed pas yang na ni rang gi bu la za bar 'gyur yang na ni bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /sems
can chen pos smras pa/ nyon mongs ma 'di'i zas ci/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ 'di ltar gang sha sar pa dang / khrag dron po yod na de ni stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / seng ge
rnams kyi zas yin no zhes zer ro/ /lha chen pos smras pa/ 'dir nyon mongs bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / ldan pa'i lus su gyur pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig
lus te rab tu nyam chung ba 'dis gnas 'dir zas skom tshol ni mi nus na 'di'i srog yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir su zhig rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar byed cig gu/ sgra
chen pos smras pa/ kye/ rang gi lus yongs su btang ba ni bya dka' ba'o/ /sems can chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu srog dang / lus la mngon par chags pa blo chung ba rnams
la ni tshul 'di bya dka' ba lags kyi gzhan lus yongs su gtong ba la zhugs pa gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la ni dka' ba ma lags so/ /yang / snying brtse
snying rje las byung 'phags pa'i sems can dag /lha yul dang ni sa 'dir rang lus rnyed snyam ste/ /gzhan gyi srog phyir mthun par dga' ba'i yid kyis ni/ /'gyur ba med par
'dir ni rnam pa brgya yis rtse/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de shin tu mi dga' ste stag mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas nas song ngo / /de nas sems can chen po 'di
snyam du sems te da ni bdag gi lus 'di yongs su gtong ba'i dus la bab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig cing 'gyes pa'i chos can mthar 'gyed mtha' ngan pa/ /rnag can lus
'di zas dang skom dang mal cha dang / /bzhon pa 'os pa chen po dag gis ring bsrungs kyang / /snga med rang gis rang bzhin mi 'dor byas don med/ /yang thams cad du mi gtsang
bar gyur bas na de'i 'tsho ba med kyi/ da bdag gis de las bzang po la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de'i phyir bdag skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyur ro/ /
@#/ /yang / snying po med lus dbu pa 'dra la srin bu brgyas gang byas pa chud gzon pa/ /'bras 'dra ba yi srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang phyi sas gang ba 'di
btang ste/ /mya ngan med cing 'gyur med phung med dri med bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis/ /kun tu gang ba'i chos sku yon tan brgyas gang rdul dang bral ba thob par
bya| /de snying rje mchog dang ldan pa'i snying du gyur pas de ltar brtul nas khyod gnyis gshegs su gsol/ bdag ni rang gi bgyi ba zhig gi slad du nags stug po bcu
gnyis su 'jug go zhes de gnyis bskrad do/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can chen po nags 'dab de nas slar log ste stag gi gnas su song nas nags kyi yal ga
la gos gzar te/ bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs pa med pa zhi ba thob 'dod de/ /gzhan gyis btang bar dka' ba'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i snying
rjes sbyin/ /bdag gis skyon med byang chub rin med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par shog /bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'jigs las 'jig rten gsum
po bsgral bar bya/ /zhes smon lam btab bo/ /de nas sems can chen po stag mo'i mdun du nyal ba dang / de nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la
stag mos ci'ang ma byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas/ kye ma'o/ /'di ni nyam chung bas mi nus so snyam nas langs te snying brtse ba'i blo gros kyis mtshon cha btsal na gang nas kyang
mtshon cha ma rnyed nas des 'od ma'i yal ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te bdag gi mgul pa bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel to/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag
tu chu'i dbus su son pa'i gru rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /nyi ma'ang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do/ /lha'i
spos dang / phye ma dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char yang bab bo/ /de nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod
'dir ji ltar thugs rjes sems can rnams khyab ste/ /mi yi dbang po rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'dir btang bas na/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi ba gnas kyi
mchog /zhi ba gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dir ni tshegs med ring por mi thogs brnyes/ /de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag gis sbags pa la bldags nas
yud tsam gyis sha dang / khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig lus par byas so/ /de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de dag la bsams nas lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//
@#/ /ji ltar phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho'i mthar thug rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/ /sa 'di rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni med gyur la/ /me tog char pa bab
cing kho bo'i yid kyang 'khrugs pas na/ /da gzod bdag gi nu bos rang gi lus ni btang yang dag /lha chen pos smras pa/ de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smra la/ /bkres dang
ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyas gtses pa/ /shin tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang / /za bar chas la lta bas bdag kyang dogs/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis rab tu mya
ngan gyis non nas mchi mas mig gang ste lam de nyid nas slar log nas stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang / gos thams cad ni 'od ma'i yal ga la gzar/ rus pa rnams
ni bye zhing bral/ khrag ni rdzab tu gyur/ skra ni phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams su 'thor bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang brgyal te rus pa'i steng du 'gyel nas ring zhig
lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed de langs nas lag pa bsgreng ste nyam thag pa'i sgra byung ngo / /kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang / /de bzhin du ni bu la rab tu gdung
ba'i ma/ /pad+ma 'dra ba'i mig ring khyod kyi gar bzhag ces/ /ma ni bdag cag la yang tha chungs 'dri bar 'gyur/ /kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa phyogs 'di nyid du/ /shi na
legs kyi gson na de lta ma yin no/ /sems can chen po med par gyur pas bdag cag la/ /pha ma dag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis
kyis snying rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por dus nas dong ngo / /de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu'i rim gro ba rnams kyang gzhon nu tshol zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams su rgyug pa dang / gcig
gis gcig mthong nas gzhon nu ga re/ gzhon nu ga re zhes 'dri'o/ /de'i tshe btsun mo mal na nyal ba'i rmi lam na sdug pa dang bral bar rmis pa/ 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis bcad
pa dang / so phyung ba dang / thi ba'i phru gu skrag pa gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer bar mthong ngo / /de nas btsun mo sa g.yos pas snying dngangs te mod la sad nas sems
pa la zhugs te/ 'byung po'i rten ma rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab g.yo ci zhig gu/ nyi ma 'od zer med par gyur pas nga yi snying la mya ngan 'gyur bar ston/ /nga yi
lus ni zhum zhing mig kyang g.yo la rang gi nu ma bcad rmis pa/ /nga yi bu rnams nags khrod 'dir ni rtser dong ba la dge bar 'gyur ram ge /de nas de snyam bsams pa
dang bran mo'ang snying myos te 'ongs nas btsun mo la smras pa/ jo mo gzhon nu'i rim gro pa dag gzhon nu tshol zhing mchis na jo co stor ces gda'o/ /de skad ces thos ma thag
@#/ /tu btsun mo'i snying 'dar zhing mig dang / gdong mchi mas gang ste rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha/ bdag gi bu sdug pa stor ces thos so/ /
rgyal po yang snying 'dar zhing shin tu myos te/ kyi hud/ bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba lta zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir nga gzhon
nu btsal ba la nan tan du byed kyi bzang mo mya ngan ma byed cig /der gzhon nu tshol ba la zhugs pa na skye bo'i tshogs dag rong rong por gyur te de nas ring por ma lon par
rgyal pos rgyal bu gzhon nu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang smras pa/ gzhon nu de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/ kyi hud/ bu dang
bral ba lta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/ /ji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yid ni mi bde ba/ /mi rnams bu rnyed pa ni de ltar dga' ba ma yin no/ /'jig rten na ni gang
dag bu med pa dang shi ba'am/ /mi rnams gang dag bu gson de dag bde ba yin nam ci/ /de nas btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas rnga mo gnad du bsnun pa
bzhin du shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra phyung ngo / /de ltar bu gsum dag ni g.yog gi tshogs bcas te/ /me tog rnams kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las/ /bdag gi
bu dge tha chungs 'ongs par ma gyur na/ /bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tha chungs de ga re/ /de nas de gnyis lhags pa dang rgyal pos bu la dris pa/ khye'u tha chung ga re zhes gzhon nu
gnyis la dris pa dang / de nas mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing mig mchi mas gang ste rkan dang / mchu dang / kha dang / so skams nas cang mi zer ro/ /btsun mos smras pa/ kho mo'i
bu sdug tha chung de ga re/ /kho mo'i snying 'di gsal thug gyur cing / /lus ni mi bzad rab tu gzir gyur te/ /kho mo 'drin pa nyams gyur myur du smros/ /de nas gzhon nu de
gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de zhib tu smras so/ /de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang / btsun mo myos par 'gyur te myos pa sangs nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing phyogs der dong ngo //
de nas rgyal po dang / btsun mos rus pa de dag sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa med cing skra phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong nas shing rlung gis btab pa
bzhin du 'gyel to/ /de nas nye phan dang / blon po dag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas chu dang / rim la ya'i tsan+dan gyi lde gus rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i lus bsil bar
byas so/ /de nas ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed nas rgyal po langs te snying rje rje slad du 'bod pa/ kye ma bu sdug yid 'ong mthong dga' ba/ /'chi bdag dbang du ci phyir de
@#/ /myur song / /'chi bdag ci phyir nga la sngar ma 'ongs/ /nga la sdug bsngal 'di las gzhan mi 'byung / /btsun mo'ang myos pa las sangs nas skra gzhig

cing lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs te nya thang la phyung ba bzhin du sa'i steng na 'gre ldog cing ma he be'u stor ba dang / rnga mo rde'u stor ba bzhin du snying rje rje skad du ngu'o/ /kye ma sdug
cing gces pa'i bu ni pad+ma 'di/ /su yis sa yi steng du bshig nas rab tu gtor/ /yid 'ong mig ldan zla 'dra'i bzhin can bdag gi bu/ /bdag gi dgra bo gang gis de ring
sa 'dir bcom/ /kye ma sa 'dir bu mchog bsad mthong na/ /lus 'di ci phyir de ring zhig ma gyur/ /sdug bsngal 'di 'dra mthong yang ma gas pas/ /bdag gi snying 'di
lcags ni yin yang dag /de ring rmi lam du ni bdag gi nu ma 'ga' zhig gis ni ral gris bcad/ /so yang phyung bas de ring bdag gi bu sdug de ni myur du ma rung gyur/ /
bdag gis thi ba'i phrug gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar khras khyer bzhin/ /bdag gi bu gsum dag gis bskor ba las kyang gcig ni de ring 'chi bdag khyer/ /
kye ma ho sdig pa can gyi rmi lam de yi 'bras bu grub pa 'di yin no/ /de nas rgyal po dang / btsun mo snying rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por smra zhing rgyan thams cad bkrol nas
skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus bu la mchod pa byas nas gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams phyogs 'dir bzhag go /kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu
sems can chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can
chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las yongs su ma grol ba de'i tshe'ang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug
bsngal las ngas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags nas skyon thams cad dang bral te yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa da ltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar sems can
re re'i phyir yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su bskal par gnas par spro zhing skye bo 'khor ba las rnam par bsgral lo/ /sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa
sna tshogs du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /byang chub mchog 'di yongs su
tshol ba na/ /bskal pa mang por ngas ni lus btang ste/ /ji ltar rgyal po dang ni rgyal bur gyur/ /de ltar ngas ni lus rnams yongs su btang / /sngon gyi skye ba rnams ni rjes
@#/ /dran te/ /shing rta chen po zhes bya'i rgyal po byung / /de la bu ni gtong ba che ldan pa/ /sems can che zhes bya ba dam pa yod/ /de la phu bo dag ni gnyis yod
de| |ming ni sgra chen po dang lha chen po/ /dpung tshogs de dag nags tshal stug por dong / /de dag stag mo bkres pas gzir ba mthong / /di la sems can mchog de snying rje
skyes| |stag mo 'di ni bkres skom gzir bas na/ /bdag bu de dag za bar 'gyur 'ong gis/ /de ltar bdag lus da ni gtang bar bya/ /shing rta che bu sems can che/ /stag
mo bkres mthong stag phrug rnams/ /thar bar bya phyir snying rje yis/ /ri ngos gzar nas mchongs pa dang / /sa ni ri dang bcas su gsol/ /bya tshogs rnam mang rnam par
'thor/ /ri dwags tshogs skrag 'jig rten 'di/ /mun pas thibs por gnas par gyur/ /de yi phu bo sgra chen dang / /de bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis/ /nags mchog
chen po der bltas na/ /sems can chen po ma rnyed nas/ /shin tu mya ngan zug rngu'i snying / /dran med nags kyi nang na rgyu/ /nu bo de ni yongs tshol zhing / /gdong la mchi
zag nags khrod rgyu/ /sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gnyis/ /stag mo nyam chung gar nyal ba/ /der ni nye bar song ba dang / /stag mo dang ni stag
phrug gi /stag gi mchu la khrag chags mthong / /sgra dang rus pa cung zad cig /sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong / /de yi khrag gi thigs pa ni/ /nyung zhig sa la yod par gyur/ /rgyal
po'i bu ni de gnyis kyis/ /khrag chags pa yi sa de mthong / /rab tu brgyal te sa de la/ /'gyel nas yid ni nyams par 'gyur/ /lus rnams la ni rdul gyis gos/ /dran dbang
nyams shing sems kyang myos/ /de dag gi ni 'khor rnams kyang / /snying rjer ngu zhing mya ngan non/ /de dag chus ni rab 'thor zhing / /lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing gnas/ /de ni
'gyel ma thag tu yang / /btsun mo gces mchog skyed pa'i ma/ /bud med dag ni lnga brgya dang / /pho brang nang na bder 'dug pa/ /nu sor gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas/ /'o ma
khrag tu 'byung zhing 'dzag /de yi lus dang yan lag kun/ /khab kyis gtsags pa bzhin du tsha/ /snying ni rab tu mya ngan gang / /bu bral mya ngan drag mangs phog /rgyal
po'i gan du nyer song ste/ /mya ngan rab gdungs yid mi dga'/ /snying rje'i sgra yis rab ngu zhing / /rgyal po shing rta che la smras/ /mi dbang rgyal po bdag la gson/ /bdag
lus mya ngan me yis tshig /bdag gi nu sor rtse gnyis nas/ /'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung / /bdag lus khab kyis gtsags bzhin tsha/ /bdag gi snying yang gas la thug/
@#/ /ji ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams ni/ /phyin cad mi mthong 'di 'dra'i ltas/ /bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal/ /thugs rje mdzod de bdag srog stsol/ /de
ring bdag gi rmi lam na/ /thi ba phrug gu gsum rnyed na/ /bdag gi thi ba phrug gu ni/ /sdug cing yid 'ong gang lags pa/ /der ni khra mchis bdag gi ni/ /thi ba phrug gu de
khras 'tshal/ /bdag gi rmi lam de 'dra ba'i/ /mya ngan snying 'dir rab tu zhugs/ /sems ni mya ngan rab gdungs pas/ /bdag ni ring por mi thogs 'gum/ /bdag
gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal/ /thugs rje ldan pa bdag srog stsol/ /de skad smras nas btsun mo mchog /brgyal nas sa der 'gyel bar gyur/ /dran pa'i dbang po
rnam par nyams/ /sems kyang stor zhing dran pa med/ /btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang / /snying rje'i skad kyis rab tu du/ /btsun mo dam pa brgyal gyur
te| |sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni/ /de ma thag tu rgyal dbang de/ /bu dang bral ba'i mya ngan non/ /blon po dang ni 'khor rnams kyang / /gzhon nu rnams ni btsal phyir
dong | |grong khyer kun gyi skye bo dag /tha dad khyim nas byung zhing 'khod/ /ngu zhing gdong nas mchi ma zag /lam khar sems can che de 'dri/ /gson nam 'on te shi 'am
ci| |sems can chen po de gar song / /bdag cag de ring mthong zhig gam/ /yid 'ong sems can mthong re dga'/ /de'u re mi snyan thos 'gyur zhing / /yul 'dir mya
ngan mi bzad rlung / /sgra mi phyin cing rgyu mtha' yas/ /drag po'i sgrar bcas ldan zhig gam/ /rgyal po shing rta che langs te/ /mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du/ /btsun mo dam
pa sar 'gyel la/ /bdag nyid chu yi rgyun kyang 'thor/ /ji srid dran rnyed ldan 'gyur pa/ /de srid du ni chu yis gtor/ /bdag bu gum mam gson zhig ces/ /zhum
pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed/ /rgyal po shing rta chen po yis/ /btsun mo mchog la 'di skad smras/ /blon po dag dang 'khor rnams kyang / /gzhon nu rnams ni tshol phyir
dong | |khyod ni rab tu yid zhum zhing / /rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed/ /de ltar shing rta chen po yis/ /btsun mo dam pa spro bsrings te/ /rgyal po pho brang nang byung nas/ /mya
ngan non cing brgyal bzhin du/ /blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor te/ /yid ni rab zhum lus kyang zhan/ /srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang / /ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin
rgyug /rgyal pu rnams ni btsal ba'i phyir/ /grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung / /rgyal po byung ba mthong nas ni/ /rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang / /rgyal po shing rta chen po
@#/ /ni| |grong khyer nas byung de ma thag /sdug pa'i bu ni blta ba'i phyir/ /rgod pa'i mig gis phyogs su bltas/ /mgo bregs yan lag khrag sbags
shing | |lus la rdul gyis gos gyur la/ /gdong la mchi zag ngu bzhin du/ /'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni/ /shing rta chen po'i snying la yang / /rab tu mi bzang mya
ngan gnas/ /ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zag /lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug /de nas blon po gzhan zhig ni/ /rgyang ring myur du rings par 'ong / /'ongs nas mi dbang
rgyal po ni/ /shing rta che la 'di skad smras/ /mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig /khyod sras yid du 'ong ba mchis/ /ring por mi thogs khyod kyi gan 'dir ni/ /sras
mchog yid 'ong mchi ba khyod kyis gzigs/ /rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang / /de nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs/ /rdul chags dri ma can gyi
gos gyon cing / /mchi ma'i gdong gis rgyal la 'di skad ces/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras gnyis ni/ /mya ngan me yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas/ /rgyal po
khyod kyi sras mchog gcig mi gda'/ /sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin/ /stag mo bu byung ring bor ma lon pa/ /rang gi bu rnams za bar 'dod pa mthong / /
de dag la ni gzhon nu sems can ches/ /snying rje chen po ldan pas sems bskyed nas/ /byang chub tu ni smon lam che btab pa/ /sems can thams cad bdag gis dgrol
bar bya/ /byang chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la/ /ma 'ongs dus na bdag gis reg par bya/ /sems can chen po ri ngos gzar nas mchongs/ /stag mo bkres pas non pa de
langs te/ /yud tsam gyis ni lus la sha med byas/ /rgyal po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tshe lus/ /ma rungs pa yi tshig ni de thos nas/ /rgyal po shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te/ /sa
la 'gyel nas sems kyang stor bar gyur/ /mya ngan me ni shin tu mi bzad 'bar/ /'khor dang blon po snying rje'i skad kyis ni/ /ngu zhing mya ngan non bzhin de dag kyang / /chus
'thor lag pa bsgreng ste rab tu ngu / /blon po gsum pas rgyal la smras pa ni/ /bdag gis de ring gzhon nu gnyis po dag /nags chen de na rab tu brgyal gyur cing / /sa
la 'gyel te sems kyang stor mthong nas/ /dran pa rnyed de langs kyi bar du ni/ /bdag cag rnams kyis chab kyis rab tu gtor/ /phyogs bzhi dag nas kun nas 'bar
bar mthong / /yud tsam 'greng nas slar yang sa la 'gyel/ /snying rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don/ /rtag par lag pa bsgreng ste gnas nas ni/ /nu bo de yi bsngags
@#/ /pa rab tu brjod/ /rgyal po de ni rab tu sems zhum zhing / /bu bral mya ngan non nas sems kyang 'khrugs/ /mya ngan rab tu gdungs shing smre sngags
'don/ /rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongs su sems/ /bdag bu sdug cing yid 'ong gcig po ni/ /sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin/ /bdag gi bu ni gnyis
po de dag kyang / /mya ngan me yis srog ni zad 'ong gis/ /'di ltar bdag ni myur du der dong la/ /mthong na dga' ba'i bu dag blta bar byas/ /bzhon pa mgyogs pas
rgyal po'i pho brang gi /rgyal po'i khab tu myur du bkri bar bya/ /de dag rnams ni bskyed pa'i ma yi snying / /mya ngan me yis gas par 'gyur du 'ong / /bu gnyis mthong
nas zhi ba thob 'gyur te/ /srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas/ /glang chen zhon te bu rnams blta phyir song / /
bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis rab ngu zhing / /nu bo'i ming 'bod lam nas 'ong ba mthong / /rgyal pos bu de gnyis ni khrid nas su/ /rab tu ngu zhing khyim du song nas
ni| |de yis skyen par la gor myur du yang / /btsun mo la ni rang gi bu rnams bstan/ /shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /sngon gyi rgyal po shing rta chen po
yi| |bu de sems can chen po mchog gyur cing / /gang gis stag mo bde bar byas pa yin/ /rgyal po'i dbang po dam pa zas gtsang ni/ /shing rta che zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur
btsun mo'ang btsun mo dam pa sgyu mar gyur/ /sgra chen po ni byams par gyur pa yin/ /rgyal bu lha chen po yang de bzhin du/ /de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin/ /stag
mor gyur pa skye dgu'i bdag mo che/ /stag phrug rnams ni dge slong lnga por gyur/ /de nas rgyal po shing rta chen po dang / btsun mos snying rje bar smre sngags rnam pa mang po bton
nas rgyan thams cad bkrol te skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas sems can chen po de'i rus pa de dag sa phyogs 'di nyid du bzhag ste
rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'di byas so/ /sems can chen po 'dis stag mo la lus yongs su btang nas lus yongs su btang ba 'dis phyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa
bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa rnams su'ang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya'o/ /zhes smon lam 'di skad btab bo/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang
mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /mchod rten 'di 'dir bstan
@#/ /pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin no/ /rkyen ni 'di yin no/ /mchod rten de'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so/ /gser 'od dam pa
mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stag mo la lus yongs su btang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' brgya
stong phrag du ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa gser dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang
chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gis thal mo sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de la tshigs su bcad
pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /rgyal ba'i sku mdog btso ma'i gser 'dra ste/ /sku lus gser gyi mdog tu rnam par gda'/ /gser gyi ri dbang lta bu'i
gser gyi mdog /thub pa pad+ma dkar po gser mdog can/ /bzang po'i mtshan gyis sku lus rab tu brgyan/ /dpe byad sna tshogs bzang pos sku lus spras/ /gser gyi
'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar/ /shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra snyan tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /seng ge'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs//
yan lag drug cu bsgrags sgra dri med sgra/ /rgyal dbyangs rma bya ka la ping ka'i sgra/ /shin tu dri med dri bral gzi 'od mdzes/ /rgyal ba bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan
mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri med dri bral mchog /rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra/ /sems can rnams la phan pa thugs brtse mchog /'jig rten dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i
mchog /rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa ste/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'dzud pa lags/ /'chi ba med pa'i bde ba stsol ba ste/ /rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu
ston| |'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste/ /bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i gnas/ /rgyal bas 'gro ba sdug bsngal thar bar mdzod/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho
las ni skye dgu sgrol/ /zhi ba'i lam la skye dgu rab tu 'dzud/ /skye dgu rnams la bde ba kun stsol ba/ /khyod la dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te/ /de snyed 'dren pa'i yon
tan ye shes mtsho/ /srog chags kun la khyod kyi thugs rje dang / /byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang / /khyod kyi yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho las/ /
@#/ /bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang / /yon tan thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan par/ /lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis/ /yon
tan mtsho las yon tan thigs blangs te/ /de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshad/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags de yis ni/ /sems can de
dag byang chub mchog reg shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu dgu
pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /thub dbang
khyod ni bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan/ /dpal stong mdzes pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /kha dog rgya chen mchog tu zhi ba ston/ /nyi ma stong ltar 'od ni rnam par
'phro/ /'od zer du ma 'bar bas 'od kyis khyab/ /kha dog sna tshogs dang bas rin chen 'dra/ /sngon po dkar po gser 'od bai DUR+ya/ /zangs dang skya rengs shel gyi
'od lta bus/ /rdo rje ri dbang ri rab thal mdzad cing / /zhing rnams bye ba du mar snang mdzad de/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po zhi bar mdzad/ /bde ba mchog gis sems can tshim par
mdzad/ /mdog dang dbang po gsal bag blta na mdzes/ /gzugs bltas mi ngoms spyi bos blta na dga'/ /rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu skra rnam par mdzes/ /bung ba mang pos
gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra/ /thugs rje rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /ting 'dzin byams pa bsod nams dam pa bsags/ /dpe byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs ldan/ /
ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag yon tan brgyan/ /khyod ni rab tu tshim mdzad phan pa mdzad/ /bde mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas 'byung / /yon tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams
kyis brgyan/ /zhing rnams bye ba dag tu lhang nge ste/ /me yi 'od ltar 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes/ /ji ltar nam mkhar nyi dkyil rdzogs pa bzhin/ /ri rab lta bur yon tan
kun ldan par/ /'jig rten khams rnams kun tu rab tu gda'/ /ba zho ku mu da dung zla 'dra zhing / /kha ba'i mdog dang dkar po bzang 'dra ba'i/ /tshems kyi phreng bas khyod
kyi zhal mdzes pa/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po bar snang ji bzhin no/ /khyod kyi zhi zhal mtshams nas zla ba 'dra/ /g.yas su 'khyil zhing khong chud 'dra ba lags/ /bai DUR+ya 'dra'i
@#/ /spu 'od dkar rnams kyis/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na nyi ma lta bur mdzes/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ rnam par dag pa'i chos la spobs pa'i blo mnga' ba/ /las ngan lam dang bral ba'i bdag nyid blo mnga' zhing / /srid dang srid min
mkhyen pa rnam dag blo mnga' ba/ /sangs rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas gzi brjid mtha' yas te/ /kye ma'o kye ma'o rgya mtsho dang
ni ri rab 'dra/ /kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te/ /u dum wA ra'i me tog bzhin du shin tu dkon/ /sems can dag ni thams cad rjes su gzung slad
du| |gang gis mdo sde dam pa 'di 'dra rab gsungs pa/ /mi dbang nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po'i rigs kyi tog /kye ma'o kye ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje ldan/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa shAkya'i thub pa dbang po zhi/ /zhi ba'i dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab tu zhugs/ /ting 'dzin zab cing zhi la rdul dang bral ba ni/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas
spyod yul der yang rab tu zhugs/ /de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa ste/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rnams kyi gnas pa'ang stong pa lags/ /chos rnams de dag thams cad
rang bzhin stong lags na/ /sems can rnams ni stong pa'i bdag nyid ma 'tshal to/ /rtag pa ther zug tu ni rgyal ba dran par bgyid/ /rgyal ba mthong bar yang ni rtag tu mya ngan
bgyid/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma mthong bar bgyid slad du/ /rtag par yang ni smon lam rab tu 'debs par bgyid/ /bdag ni rtag tu dog sar pus mo btsugs nas su//
rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis skom pa'i mya ngan rab tu sems/ /'dren pa'i slad du snying rje'i skad kyis ngu bar bgyid/ /bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa mthong bar rab tu skom/ /mya
ngan me yis kun tu rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ /mthong ba'i chu bsil bdag la rtag par stsal du gsol/ /bdag ni khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas rab tu skom/ /thugs rje'i char
gyis bdag la rab tu sim par mdzod/ /'dren pa khyod kyis bdag la thugs rje mdzad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i gzugs mthong ba ni bdag la stsal du gsol/ /khyod ni lha dang
bcas pa'i 'gro ba skyob pa ste/ /'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa lags/ /sems can thams cad dag ni rmi lam rang bzhin te/ /nam mkha' 'dra zhing nam mkha'i
@#/ /ngo bo nyid kyang lags/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu dang ni chu yi zla ba 'dra/ /'dren pa khyod kyis ston pa tshe dang ldan pa lags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan
las bzhengs te tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod legs so/ /khyod yang legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
nas rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la sogs pa lha yi bu mo de dag thams cad dang / lha mo chen mo dpal la la sogs pa
lha mo'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang / rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa lha'i rgyal po de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi
dang | lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
po'i rgyal po las/ mjug sdud pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ mahA sa ha sra bra marda na sU tra/ bod skad du/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/
sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i
ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul shing ljon pa rab tu snang ba'i nags tshogs na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu la/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa

shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe

dang ldan pa cang shes kauN+Di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa kA t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan
pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa lag bzang dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags
pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i bar de la sogs pa'i dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi
dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lus 'phags mo'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma
@#/ /skyes dgras na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / bsnyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/ bla mar
byas| bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas so/ /yang de'i tshe sa yang cher g.yos par gyur/ sprin 'dus pa chen po'ang byung / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / ser ba
chen po dang / sprin chen po las char pa chen po'ang 'bab par gyur/ 'brug kyang di ri ri zer/ glog kyang byung / phyogs bcu'ang 'khrugs par gyur to/ /mun
pa mun nag chen po'ang byung ste skar ma rnams kyang mi snang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rnams kyang 'od dang mi ldan par gyur te lhan ner ma yin lhang der ma yin zhing 'od
mi gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por 'jigs pa de dag byung ba dang / yangs pa can gyi li tsa bI kha cig gis grong gzhan dang /
grong khyer gang yin pa de dag gdon 'byung pos btab par gyur/ grong gi gzhon nu rnams dang / rtsis mkhan rnams dang / blon po dang / blon po chen po dang /
'khor na gnas pa dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / mngag pa dang / g.yog kha cig kyang gdon 'byung pos btab par gyur/ yul yangs
pa can gyi ljongs kun gyi dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang 'jigs skrag dngangs te skyi bung zhes byed nas kha gnam du bltas te
du 'bod cing sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa'i bram ze
dang | khyim bdag de dag kha cig ni tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal/ kha cig ni brgya byin la/ kha cig ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal/ kha cig ni dbang phyug
chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / 'phrog ma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / ri dang / nags tshogs dang / sman
dang | shing ljon pa dang / klung dang / lteng ka dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu dang / rdzing dang / mchod rten gyi gnas na gnas pa dag la phyag 'tshal zhing bdag
cag 'di 'dra ba'i gnod pas 'jigs pa'i gnas nas ji ltar thar bar 'gyur snyam du sems shing 'khod pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mi las 'phags pa'i
spyan rnam par dag pas gzigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
@#/ /'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dad par gyur te 'dus par gyur pa
rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa/ mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha
rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde
dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin chen po stobs po che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nub mo 'das
pa dang / dag pa lta bu'i bya rgod phung po'i ri la bdag gi kha dog dang mthus snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshig gcig dbyangs gcig ngag gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ shin tu 'bar ba'i gser dang 'dra/ /zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /dpal ldan rnam thos bu bzhin brtan/ /rin chen
rnams kyis 'byung gnas legs/ /seng+ge glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros/ /glang chen myos pa bzhin du gnon/ /gser gyi ri bo dang yang mtshungs/ /dzam+bu gling gi gser rgyan
'dra| |skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i/ /nam mkha'i zla ba dri med bzhin/ /nyan thos dge 'dun rnams kyi dbus/ /mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan par gyur/ /lha
dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di/ /thub pa la ni skyabs su mchi/ /mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /srung ba dus su nye bar gnas/ /sangs rgyas snga mas bshad pa yi/ /stong
chen rab 'joms mdo sde 'di/ /khor khor yug ri mtha'i bar/ /mtshams gcod pa yi dam pa lags/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod
la| |chos kyi rgyal po thub chen la/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam cig cang mi gsung bar dgongs nas rgyal po chen po dag la
bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dag /gang khyed kyi 'khor nga'i 'khor la 'tshe bar sems pa de ni tshul ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i 'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas
byung ba dang / chos legs par gsungs pa dang / dge 'dun legs pa sgrub pa de la sa bon 'di btab na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
@#/ /rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de la 'jig rten de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba
bskyed nas lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis las lha'i ris gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ rgyal po dag kyang dmag rnam bzhi dang ldan pa nas gling bzhi la dbang ba'i
'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen por chos kyi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur te de dag la'ang bu dpa' ba/ rtul
phod pa| yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs bdog pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa
stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na 'jig rten 'dir rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur bar khyed snying las chung dus gnas pas gnas par gyis shig /de nas
rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la grong dang / skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang /
khang pa brtsegs pa dang / bsil khang dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / dar gyi lda ldi bzang zhing mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / dril bu dang /
mu tig gi dra bas yongs su bskor ba dang / pog phor nas bdug pas bdugs pa dang / me tog gis gtor ba'i khyim dang / gnas dang / khang pa chen po dag mchis te der
bdag cag bud med brgya phrag stong dag gis yongs su bskor cing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan par gyur nas gnas te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag rab tu myos pas bag ma mchis par gnas pas gnas pa na 'khor zas dang / skom tshol du phyogs bcu kun tu 'byer zhing skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u
dang / bu mo dang / btsas ma thag pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/ 'tshe bar bgyid/ bgegs bgyid/ 'gum
par bgyid/ gsod par bgyid/ srog dang bral bar bgyid de btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag gis 'khor bzhi'i mdun du bdag cag gi 'khor gyi
tshul gyi mtshan ma bstan par bgyi'o/ /gang gi 'khor gyi gdon byung ba der rgyal po chen po de'i gzugs mchod rten dang bcas pa chen po bgyis te nad pas rgyal po chen po
@#/ /de'i ming nas dbyung zhing dri sna tshogs kyis rang gi lag nas bdug par 'gyi'o/ /des sa la me tog bsil ma bkram ste zhugs mar bsal mchod
rten de la mchod par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ phyi phyir
rgod cing 'jigs par 'gyur/ /smra bar bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur/ /de ni gnyid kyang log par 'gyur/ /yang na shin tu na bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu gyen du blta bar
'gyur/ /skar ma dag la snyegs par bgyid/ /nub mo shin tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu 'dar zhing sgra 'byin te/ /de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyi/ /'jig
rten mgon po bdag la gson/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ sid+d+he su sid+d+he/ sa twe a re/ a re Na/ ba le/ mahA ba le/ dzam+b+he/ dzi Ti le/ a kha ne/ ma kha ne/ kha kha ni/ kha
raT+Te| khar rga le/ ha ri ping+ga le/ ti ming+gi le ti ming+gi le/ ti ming+gi li ni mang+ga le swA hA/ bdag gi sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig /rgyal po chen po rnam
thos kyi bu'i ming dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung stan las langs te bla
gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi 'khor dri za'i gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ glu len cing ni bro rdung ste/ /rgyan rnams la yang
dga' bar bgyid/ /brkam pa ma mchis mang par smra/ /rgod par bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur/ /skom par 'gyur la mig dmar te/ /rtag tu rims kyis 'debs par
bgyid/ /mig kyang 'byed par mi bgyid de/ /rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyal bar bgyid/ /de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyi/ /'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/ s+yAd
ya the dan/ a khe/ na khe/ bi na khe/ ban+d+he/ ba rAng+ge/ tsa pa le/ ba khe/ ba kha ne/ ba kha ne/ a bi ni/ na lo ni/ ba hu le/ b+ha khe/ b+ha gan+da le/ ba she ba sha brti ni
swAhA| rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gi ming dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag gdon thams cad las thar bar gyur cig swAhA/ de nas rgyal
po chen po 'phags skyes po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs
@#/ /su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi 'khor yi dwags grul
bum gyis zin pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ shin tu skom pas 'debs par gyur/ /g.yeng bas btab cing blta bar 'gyur/ /bzhin yang dmar
por gda' bar 'gyur/ /bskums nas sa la nyal bar 'gyur/ /kha dog ngan cing lus kyang skem/ /skra dang se mo ring ba ste/ /dri ma can la dri mi bda'/ /brdzun
dang kyal pa smra bar bgyid/ /de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyi/ /'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ kha kha kha mi/ kha la ne/ kha la mi/ kha rA li/
kha ra li/ ka ra khe/ ka shi ne/ ka ra Te/ kA li/ kA mi ni/ bi ba la/ bi d+he ya sha ni sa pa ba te/ sha ma sha ma ni swAhA/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po'i ming dang /
stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag gi gdon dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las
langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan
'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi 'khor klu 'dab bzang gi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu
lags te/ skyigs bus 'debs shing dbugs kyang 'byin/ /de bzhin dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur/ /rdul zhing dbu ba kha chu 'byung / /phyi phyir gnyid kyang log par
'gyur/ /kha dog ldan zhing dpa' ba ste/ /de bzhin 'dar zhing rgyug par 'gyur/ /sen mo dag kyang ston par bgyid/ /dog sar mchis shing ngu bar bgyid/ /de la
sngags kyi tshig mchis kyi/ /'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ kra ka mi/ kra ga ma ni/ kra ga se/ kru gra she/ kra kra/ sha mi/ kru shru mi kru shru mi/
kruk+ke/ krug klu ma/ kru ge /a ga le/ nA ga le/ sa ma ga le/ ku hu me/ gu me/ a la ke/ ka lu ke/ ka la ma le/ ga la le/ i ri mi re/ d+hi re/ a ru ga ba ti swAhA/
rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gi ming dang / stobs dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'khor thams cad mdun du seng
ge'i sgra bsgrags pa/ nga ni stobs bcu dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa ste 'khor gyi nang du seng ge sgra khyu mchog lta bu rgya chen po yang dag par bsgrags
@#/ /so| |tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/ /sde dang mthu dang bzhon bcas pa'i/ /bdud kyang gcig gis rab tu btul/ /sems can thams cad bsrung
ba'i phyir/ /rig sngags thams cad nga la nyon/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ a sang ge/ khaD+ga ba te/ ba la ba te/ ba la nir+g+ho She/ shU re/ shU ra d+ha re badzra sa me/ badzra ga me/ badzra
d+ha re/ stam+b+he/ dzaM b+he/ dr-i D+ha sA re/ bi ra dze/ bi g+ho She/ ba rA gra prAp+te/ a ra Ne/ a ra Ne d+harma yuk+te/ di shi bi g+hu Sh+Te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang /
stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swAhA/ phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag /sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas/ /'jigs
dang skrag dang dngangs gyur te/ /thal mo sbyar nas 'khod par gyur/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni lhags pa rnams/ /sdangs 'khrugs rod rod por gyur nas/ /phyogs
bcur rab tu 'byer byed cing / /sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed/ /rgyal po chen pos de shes nas/ /gsang ba gsum ni yang dag smra/ /kye ma rig sngags rig sngags
che| |stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa de/ /thos nas 'byung po skrag gyur te/ /dper na rab tu 'bar me dang / /til mar ngar btags
ral gri bzhin/ /go'u tams ni rab bshad pa'i/ /rig sngags spu gri'i so dang 'dra/ /drang srong tshig ni legs bshad pa/ /de la gang zhig ma dad na/ /de yi bu yi thu bo ni/ /
tshangs pa'i zhags pas med par 'gyur/ /me ni rab tu 'bar byas la/ /bla dang 'og dang phyogs bzhir yang / /sbyin sreg gi ni chus gtor te/ /nas dang yungs kar blangs
nas su/ /mar gyi snying po dang sbyar nas/ /me yi nang du blug par bya/ /legs par gsungs pa 'di thos nas/ /gal te myur du mi gtong na/ /thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ba
ni| |mar dang yungs kar mer blugs bzhin/ /gnod sbyin chad pas bsdigs nas su/ /de dag bde ba mi rnyed de/ /de yi rtsib logs g.yas par ni/ /'bras chen nad kyang
'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin nad kyis btab pa na/ /sha bkra'i nad kyis btab par 'gyur/ /lcang lo can gyi pho brang du/ /gzhan yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus ngan grogs
dang ldan pa yi/ /khyim yang mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ /'byung po mang po tshogs pa na/ /stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dag gi dkyil 'khor du/ /zas skom dang yang 'bral
bar 'gyur/ /stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde la/ /gnod sbyin gang dag mi phyogs pa/ /de la rdo rje 'chang khros te/ /spyi bo dag ni 'gems par 'gyur/ /spu gri'i so ni rtsub mo yis/ /de
@#/ /yi lce ni gcod par 'gyur/ /mtshon cha shin tu rnon po yis/ /de yi sna dang rna ba gcod/ /'khor la spu gri'i so 'dra bas/ /klad pa rab tu gshags par byed/ /
tho ba lcags kyis dkris pa yis/ /de yi snying yang 'joms par byed/ /rnag dang khrag ni dron mo dag /de yi kha nas 'dzag par gyur/ /rig sngags zhags pa'i chad pa yis/ /rtag
tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na/ /'khor ba gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor du/ /de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po dpal ldan pa/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur nas/ /chos
kyi go cha bgos gyur te/ /bzang po'i khri la 'dug pa ni/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni
lus ngan po/ /dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba yi/ /rgyal po dag ni phyin pa dang / /de tshe ston pa thams cad mkhyen/ /bar snang gnas la rab tu 'phags/ /tshangs pas sprul pa'i
gzhal med khang / /de ni rdo rje'i gdan la zhugs/ /de nas tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams/ /thal mo sbyar 'khod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /gser gyi
mchod sdong dang yang mtshungs/ /me tog pad+ma bzhin du rgyas/ /sA la'i rgyal bo bzhin du rgyas/ /nyi ma dang 'dra zla nya la/ /skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor bzhin/ /thub sku
gser gyi kha dog la/ /mtshan rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor/ /'jig rten mes po tshangs pa yis/ /'jig rten sgron ma bstod byas te/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /'jig rten skye
la 'di skad smras/ /'jig rten skyong gi 'khor rnams kyis/ /rjes su bstan pa ma thob ste/ /gang phyir 'di las sangs rgyas dang / /rang sangs rgyas dag 'byung 'gyur zhing / /'di las nyan
thos rnams kyang ste/ /lha rnams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur/ /rig byed yan lag drug mthar phyin/ /bram ze rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur/ /drang srong skal pa chen po dang / /dge slong
bram ze 'di las skye/ /khyed cag snying las chung byed pa/ /mi yi skye dgu gnod par 'gyur/ /tshangs pa yi ni tshig thos nas/ /'jig rten skyong gi tshig smras pa/ /tshangs pa chen po de bzhin
no| |thub pa chen po de bzhin no/ /bdag gis ri rab bsgul byas shing / /sa yang rab tu bzlog byas la/ /rgya mtsho la ni thug pa rnams/ /rnam par sbyang ba nyid du bya/ /zhags pa dam po
ma nyams pas/ /nyi ma zla ba rlung rnams dang / /skar ma dag ni thams cad kyang / /bdag gis su ni bcing bar bya/ /gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing / 'jig rten la ni phan mi byed/ /de
dag la ni thams cad du/ /phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o/ /'jig rten lha dang bcas pa de/ /'byung bo rnams kyi phyir smod de/ /'byung po mi yi skye dgu la/ /gnod par byed cing 'tshe
@#/ /bar byed/ /gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang / /rig sngags las ni 'da' byed pa/ /'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni/ /pha rol gnon pa ston par byed/ /rig
sngags las ni 'da' ba'i 'khor/ /kun tu chad pas bsdigs byas te/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /yang dag par yang brjod par bgyid/ /gang gis 'byung po'i dkyil
'khor du/ /'di bshad pa ni mi nyan pa/ /de dag chad pa bshad par bya/ /tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde 'o/ /sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag btsal te/ /phan tshun du ni bltas byas la/ /
bai DUR+ya dang gser dang dngul/ /mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang / /spug dang rdo yi snying po dang / /rin chen bdun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /rtsibs stong kha dog gser 'dra ba'i/ /shing
rta rnam ba bzhi byas pa/ /bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro /rgyal po dag ni der bzhugs nas/ /'byung po'i dkyil 'khor nyid du dong / /sa ni
gser gyi phye ma dang / /me tog dag gis bkang byas nas/ /mgul bar ltung dang skud pa dang / /zhags pa dag kyang gdags byos la/ /phyogs kyi sa ni ji snyed pa'i/ /'byung po
thams cad khrid shog ces/ /gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon kun/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu dgye ba byas/ /stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi/ /mdo sde yi ni dam pa 'di/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig
rten bar du byung / /lha rnams kun gyi rnam par bsams/ /stong chen po yi lus kyis su/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul/ /lus ngan po yi tshig thos nas/ /gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon
dag| phyogs bzhi dag tu song nas su/ /gsang ba po la drag tu bsgo/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/ /dri za las byung gdon gyi rnams/ /shar phyogs cha ni 'khod pa dag /mdo sde'i
zhags pas de dag kun/ /bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi/ /'byung po mang po nga la nyon/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/ /grul bum las byung gdon gyi rigs/ /lho phyogs cha
'dir 'khod pa dag /mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/ /bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi/ /'byung po mang po nga la nyon/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/ /klu las gdon du
gyur pa rnams/ /nub phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dang / /mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/ /bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi/ /'byung po mang po nga la nyon/ /thub pa 'byung po nyi
shu brgyad/ /gnod sbyin las ni gdon gyur pa/ /byang phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag /mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/ /bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi/ /'byung po mang po
nga la nyon/ /lus ngan po yi bu thu bo/ /kun tu rgyal ba mi la zhon/ /de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag /bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i
@#/ /zhags pas kun tu drangs/ /de nyid kyi ni bu gnyis pa/ /skyed pa po zhes rnam grags pa/ /de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag /bcing ba rnam pa
lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/ /de nyid kyi ni bu gsum pa/ /de yi ming ni gdon po che/ /de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/ /
bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/ /de nyid kyi ni bu bzhi pa/ /de yi ming ni bum pa'i lto/ /de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba
drug cu rnams/ /bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/ /dbang phyug chen po lha chen po/ /lag bzhi pa la stobs po che/ /de yi drung na 'khod
pa yi/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/ /bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/ /mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/ /'byung po 'joms pa'i ri la ni/ /'byung po thams
cad lhags nas su/ /rig sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rig sngags 'di ni kun tu bsams/ /chad pa mi bzad drag po ste/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas kun gyis
gsungs/ /go'u ta ma la gus par ni/ /thams cad de la skyabs su song / /g.yo med bar ni rjes zhugs shig /thams cad med par gyur ta re/ /de nas thang cig tsam gyis
ni| |'byung po mang po thams cad lhags/ /ri rnams dang ni g.yang sa dang / /rgya mtsho dang ni mtsho rnams dang / /klung dang 'bab chu lu ma dang / /dbang klong dag na gang 'khod dang / /skyed
mos tshal dang gzhal med khang / /kun dga' dang ni nags rnams dang / /mchod rten gnas dang grong gi gnas/ /ljon shing drung na gang gnas dang / /grong khyer sgo na gang gnas
dang | |grong rdal dang ni ljongs rnams dang / /rgyal po'i pho brang sgo rnams dang / /gzhal med khang na gang gnas dang / /dkyil 'khor dag dang dur khrod dang / /de bzhin lha khang rnams
dang ni| |mtshams dang sho gam gnas rnams dang / /khang stong dang ni gram sa dang / /gnod sbyin gang rnams bla 'og dang / /phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams nas/ /gnod
sbyin bye ba stong rnams ni/ /rig sngags zhags pas bkug pa rnams/ /rdza rnga dag ni brdungs nas su/ /la las rnga zlum dag ni brdung / /pi wang gling bu 'khar ba'i rnga/ /stobs che
rnams ni sgra 'byin te/ /rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs dang / /glu dang gar rnams byas nas su/ /dpang po zla ba chu lha dang / /b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu bdag /mi ldan pa dang kun tu lta/ /mngon
shes gangs can rdzogs pa dang / /tsan+dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang / /mgul ba mdzes dang mgul nges dang / /skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang / /lha las byung ba'i ma ldan dang /
@#/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /mi rgyal rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / /de bzhin phud bu lnga zhes bya/ /g.yer ma dang ni nyi zer dang / /nya lcibs dang ni rab
gri bu/ /kun gyi bshes dang grags 'dzin dang / /'brog gnas dang ni yid bzang dang / /khab sna dang ni ri sul kha/ /lnga 'dzin dang ni khab bzang dag /sde dag dpung dang
bzhon par bcas/ /lha dang klu dang dri za dang / /gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin/ /nyin gsum pa yi smyo byed dang / /de bzhin bzhi pa'i rims dag dang / /'jig rten 'tshe ba
gang yin pa/ /gnod sbyin srin po ma rungs rnams/ /phyogs bzhi nas ni bkug nas su/ /bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa rnams/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru//
thal sbyar 'khod nas 'di skad smras/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gi ni mdun rgyug pa/ /'byung po gnod sbyin lus po che/ /lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa/ /rkang mang dang ni rkang gcig pa/ /rkang bzhi pa dang rkang
gnyis pa/ /rkang pa sgreng la spyi'u tshugs dang / /lus mang mgo bo gcig pa dang / /lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi pa/ /mig mang po la lus phyed dang / /mig gcig lto ni bcu
gnyis dang / /bong bu rnga mo glang chen mgo /lag pa bsgreng la mgo btud dang / /mtshon cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag /mtshon cha'i rkang pa srin po'i rnams/ /zangs kyi skra dang zangs
kyi so/ /zangs kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag /zangs kyi tho ba'i rkang pa dang / /zangs kyi sna dang zangs kyi kha/ /rkang lag kun tu 'bar ba dang / /mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams/ /sgur
zhar wa ba gsum yod pa/ /mig mi sdug la kha glal ba/ /chu srin stag gi gzugs dang ni/ /gzugs mi sdug dang kha ral po/ /mchu 'phyangs po dang so yon po/ /rab tu gtum po
khro gnyer can/ /gsus po che dang bum rna bo/ /rna 'phyangs pa dang rna ba med/ /lag ring dang ni rna ba ring / /sna yi rtse dang la rtse ring / /lus skam lus ni ring ba dang / /skra ring rab tu
brgyan pa dang / /rkang pa mid pa phra ba dang / /dri nga ba dang bum lto bo/ /yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang / /gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto/ /gnam lto bo la rna bo che/ /gyen du brdzes skra rab
tu dmar/ /mgo bo che la gzhu mgrin po/ /skam po sgur po bum lto bo/ /ri rab rtse mo bsgul nas su/ /me 'dag gi ni char pa 'bebs/ /ljon shing ri dang rdo ba dang / /sprin gyi tshogs kyi
mdog 'dra ba/ /dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang / /grul bum rnga phran rnams kyi sgra/ /'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin/ /mid po che la bong bu'i sgra/ /nag po ser po sngon po dang / /dmar ser
@#/ /me ltar dmar ser dang | /kha pa 'dra'i spu dang ral gri'i sgra/ /dmar po khrag gis bskus pa rnams/ /mi ro dag ni khyer nas su/ /za bzhin du ni rnam
par rgyug /so rnon lag pa dmar po dang / /mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang / /lus phyed dag ni zos pa dang / /mkhal ma snying dang nang khrol gyis/ /snyim pa shin tu
bkang ba dang / /byis pa dag ni za bzhin du/ /mer mer po dang srog chags kyis/ /rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog /keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su/ /skye bo mang po
skrag par byed/ /khrag gis rab tu bkang ba yis/ /mi yi pags pa thogs nas su/ /mi bzad dug gis kun bskus te/ /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyug /grong khyer
rnams kyi sgo dag dang / /khyim nas khyim du rnam par 'thor/ /rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrug par byed/ /de ltar de na rgyal po yi/ /gdon
dang 'jigs pa chen po rnams/ /lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang / /rig sngags zhags pas rab tu bsdams/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu
mchog khyod la/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /grong khyer grong dang yul 'khor dang / /pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba ni/ /gnod sbyin ma
rungs mdangs 'phrog pa/ /snying rje med cing khrag 'thung ba/ /lus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste/ /stobs po che la sgra yang che/ /mgrin bcu po la mig stong po/ /gdon chen mig ni dmar
po rnams/ /'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste/ /lag na mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs/ /sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa dang / /lag bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs/ /lag na mtshon dang
dbyig pa thogs/ /rdo rje ma dung rtse lag par thogs/ /rab tu drag pa'i dmag brgal nas/ /phyogs kun tu ni skrag par byed/ /sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi/ /gsang ba po ni dad kun
kyang | |mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu/ /skyes pa bud med gzhan yang 'dzin/ /sha khrag dron mor bcas pa la/ /rnam par 'khrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /seng ge dang ni stag dang rta/
ma he ba lang bong bu rnga/ /glang po che yi gzugs 'dra ba/ /dom dang gzig dang spyang ki dang / /khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang / /byi la byi ba spre'u'i gzugs/ /bse dang phag dang sre mong dang //
nya dang rus spal dag gi gzugs/ /kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs/ /khwa dang 'ug pa khu byug dang / /bya rgod khra dang nya mid bcas/ /rma bya dang pa thi bya dang / /khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams
dang | |kha cig bya gag gzugs rnams su/ /gnod sbyin rnams ni mi yis mthong / /'dab bzang bya yi tshul gyis kyang / /skye bo mang po skrag par byed/ /kha cig mi yi mgo can la/ /lus
@#/ /ni bya gag bong bu 'dra/ /kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe/ /lus dang bral ba dag tu snang / /rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos/ /rgyu ma'i phreng bas
kun tu dkris/ /rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing / /srog chags rnams la gnod bar byed/ /mi bzad gdug pa'i dbugs 'byin cing / /skye dgu 'di dag skrag par
byed| |srog chags rgyud ni ji snyed par/ /sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang / /kha cig dag ni ri yang thogs/ /la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs/ /grangs ni brgya phrag stong rnams
te| |dbyug pas bsdigs shing kha drag po/ /mig phyung ba la bzhin mi sdug /srin po so ni rno ba dang / /sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang / /lce spyang gdong ni gnyer ma can/ /rkang lag
dang ni btubs pa dang / /mgo bo bcad pa'i srin po rnams/ /skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byed/ /sdig pa can rnams mdangs kyang 'phrog /mi dag gi ni lus rnams la/ /rab
tu phra ba'i gdon du snang / /spu yi bar dang gnad rnams dang / /de bzhin rma yi kha rnams su/ /lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang / /rig sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs/ /phyag
'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ri yi rgyal po ri rab dang / /de bzhin
khor khor yug dang / /bya rgod phung po gshol mda' 'dzin/ /spos ngad ldang dang gangs kyi ri/ /sna tshogs brtsegs dang paN+Da pA/ /na la dA yi ri gnyis dang / /dpal gyi ri yi
rtse mo ni/ /gang dag shin tu mthor 'phags dang / /ri po de dag kun la yang / /lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa/ /de dag thams cad mi dga' zhing / /'jigs pa'i yid kyi
mya ngan byed/ /bye ba stong gi lha dag dang / /bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang / /lha yi bu mo skal chen dag /thal mo rab tu sbyor bar byed/ /thags bzang ris dang sgra gcan
dang | |sim par byed pa'ang der phyin to/ /lha min bye ba phrag stong dang / /lha min bye ba phrag brgya dang / /de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa/ /mang po kun kyang thal mo sbyor/ /rab tu
gnas dang rgya mtsho dang / /klu yi rgyal po gzi can dang / /klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang / /dga' bo nye dga' gnyis dag dang / /rdo rje blo gros pak+shu dang / /gang+gA dga' bo sin+d+hu mtsho/ /bya
yi rgyal po 'dab bzang dang / /rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug byed dang / /stong phrag bye ba'i klu yi rnams/ /bye ba brgya yi klu dag dang / /de dag bu mo skal chen rnams/ /thal mo rab tu
sbyor bar byed/ /nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka yang / /skar ma'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor/ /gser gyi me tog yan lag na/ /ma ga d+hA na 'jigs byed pa/ /gso ba'i mtha' na
@#/ /mi thod can/ /ko sa la na rab tu dkar/ /bzang po'i yul na kha spu can/ /gyad kyi yul na grags pa 'dzin/ /lnga 'dzin pa na skrag byed pa/ /rta skye ba na
mig dmar gnas/ /srung byed pa na ser skya ste/ /sems pa na ni mig ser po/ /be'u la na bum pa'i lto/ /dga' ba'i yul na ring por skyes/ /ba lang 'dzin na rab tu //
dung yul na ni nyi ma'i grogs/ /ljongs chen rnams kyi gnod sbyin ni/ /brjod pa bcu drug de dag dang / /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ /chos skyong rab tu dkar ba dang / /ser
skya rab mdzes khyab 'jug pa/ /bum lto gsus pa zlum po dang / /chu srin bden pa 'chang ba dang / /lnga ldan rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / /gnod sbyin chen po dbang phyug che/ /
lag pa bzhi can stobs po che/ /sde pa rab tu 'dul ba ni/ /mthu bo che la stobs po che/ /gshin rje gshin rje'i pho nya dang / /bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa dang / /gnod
sbyin bye ba'i g.yog 'chang ba/ /gnod sbyin de ming 'phrog po yin/ /sha ri ta ni sder bcas dang / /ri yi bu mo gnod sbyin ma/ /gzi brjid chen mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /
'phrog ma zhes kyang grags pa dang / /gdol pa mo ni gtum po dang / /bu rnams lnga brgyas bskor ba dang / /mi rdung nag mo karka te/ /pad+ma dang ni pad+ma can/ /me tog so dang sa
ga dang / /srin mo bong bu'i rna can dang / /tsan+dan dang ni khyab 'jug len/ /seng ge ser skya dmar ser po/ /glang po klu yi so can dang / /ri bshes drag po'i mche ba can/ /srin po so
bzang yod pa dang / /tshangs pa len dang khyab 'jug len/ /gnod sbyin ha la ha la dang / /gnod sbyin rnam pa'i mchu can dag /mdung dang mda' gzhu kun thogs shing / /mi rta ba
lang ri dwags rnams/ /za zhing 'tshe ba de dag ni/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyug cing 'dong / /sa 'di rab tu g.yo bar byed/ /nags tshal rnams kyang rab tu skems/ /ri rnams kun
nas g.yo bar byed/ /skye dgu 'di dag 'tshe byed cing / /phan tshun nas ni 'du ba dag /rig sngags kyis ni drangs nas lhags/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal
skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru/ /de dag lhags par gyur pa dang / /de nas rgyal
po rnam thos bus/ /'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /bdag gi phyogs cha byang phyogs su/ /rgyal po'i gnas su sprul pa ni/ /lcang lor ldan pa yid du mchi/ /de bas
bdag ni lcang lo'i bdag /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can/ /lha rnams kun gyis bsam par gyur/ /phyir shin tu mthon po can/ /rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa lags/ /'phang du
@#/ /dpag tshad bcu drug ste/ /gser gyi rgyu las bgyis pa lags/ /phyogs bzhi lcog ni re re la'ang / /gnod sbyin rdo rje 'chang ba dag /kun nas rab tu
gnas par gyur/ /lag na mtshon cha legs par sprul/ /rgyal po'i pho brang de yi sgo/ /bzhi po gtod par bgyid pa ni/ /gcig ni gser las bgyis pa'i sgo/ /gnyis pa
dngul las bgyis pa ste/ /gsum pa shel gyi sgo mo lags/ /bzhi pa gser gyis rnam par spras/ /grong khyer de yi nang dag na/ /skyed mos tshal gyis me tog rgyas/ /de yi
nang na gzhal med khang / /rin chen bdun rgyu sna tshogs mchis/ /rin chen sna tshogs ljon shing can/ /bya phran sna tshogs skad kyang 'byin/ /me tog sna tshogs legs par
bkram/ /sna tshogs spos kyis byugs pa lags/ /gnod sbyin mo ni 'joms pa dang / /glu dang rol mos rab tu brgyan/ /dpal gyi dam pa nyams su myong / /der ni 'byung
po'i dkyil 'khor der/ /gang dag 'khor zhing mchis pa dag /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ste/ /chos 'tshal ba dang chos spyod pa/ /srog chags rnams la 'tshe mi bgyid/ /
zas dang skom gyis mi brel te/ /skye dgu mi bzad gzhan dag ni/ /longs spyod chen po tshol bgyid cing / /phyogs bzhi kun tu rnam par lta/ /grong khyer sgo yi gom yo dang / /bza'
shing rab nags tshal na/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po'i tshogs/ /bye ba stong phrag brgya mchis pa/ /de dag thams cad mdo sde yi/ /zhags pas drangs te brlag par bgyi/ /rgyal
po'i pho brang dbus na ni/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas gyur pa/ /bsil ba'i rdzing bus bskor ba ste/ /tsan+dan nags kyi 'khor ba lags/ /kun nas dpag tshad drug cu ste/ /khang pa
brtsegs ma sprul pa dag /gcig ni gser las bgyis pa ste/ /gnyis ni dngul las bgyid pa lags/ /gsum pa bai DUR+ya las bgyis/ /bzhi pa gtsang dang shel gyi rgyu/ /
lnga pa mu tig dmar po ste/ /drug pa rdo yi snying po lags/ /bdun pa spug las bgyis pa ste/ /brgyad pa rin chen bdun las bgyis/ /bud med stong phrag brgya dag kyang / /de
dag re re kun na gnas/ /lhab lhub sna tshogs mchog dag dang / /cha byad sna tshogs mang pos brgyan/ /glu dang rol mo sna tshogs dang / /bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa mchis/ /
de lta'i rab tu dga' ba yis/ /bde zhing tshim pa'i yid gyur cing / /de na bdag ni dgun skyems dang / /'dod pa dag gis rab myos pas/ /bdag gi 'khor rnams 'phyan bgyid
cing | |phyogs bcu dag tu 'jigs pa skyed/ /bud med dag dang skyes pa dang / /de bzhin khye'u bu mo dang / /mngal na gnas pa'ang 'jigs par bgyid/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas
@#/ /gtogs la'ang 'tshe/ /skar ma dag dang nyi zla dang / /gtum pa'i gza' rnams gnod par bgyid/ /lo tog sa bon 'bras bu dang / /me tog sman
dang zas skom dang / /mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'phrog cing / /mthon po rnams kyang dma' bar bgyid/ /'jig rten dag na nongs pa rnams/ /dmag dang 'thab mo shar gnyer
dang | |tshig gam zhig gam bsad phye ba/ /de kun 'byung po'i rnam par gyur/ /sbed cing ston par bgyid pa dang / /bzlog par bgyid cing rgod par bgyid/ /'jigs par bgyid
cing lta bar bgyid/ /dgrar 'gyur ba yang ston par bgyid/ /sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid/ /nyal ba dag la gnod par bgyid/ /sgo nas se gol sgra phyung zhing / /mi
snyan brjod de za bar bgyid/ /mdza' bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu/ /gda' zhing bka' mchid smra bar bgyid/ /bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu/ /'dod la spyod pa
dga' bar bgyid/ /nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni/ /zla ba'i gzugs su gda' bar bgyid/ /rlung dang skar mda' lce gzugs su/ /tshe la gnod par de dag gda'/ /skar
mda'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag /'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang khyir/ /rnam par sprul nas ljon shing dang / /mchod rten dag ni gnas na gda'/ /skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs
mdzes pa/ /'bar zhing shing rta'i sgra yang 'byin/ /gnas rnams dang ni shul dag tu/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston/ /grong khyer dag dang khyim rnams kyi/ /sgo yang gnod
sbyin de dag 'byed/ /srog dang lus kyang blangs bgyid cing / /lam ngan kun tu skor bar bgyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang / /
rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyis rnams/ /lus la na ba gnas par ston/ /nad rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang / /phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid/ /ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin
dag |thams cad log par de dag ston/ /rig sngags zhags pas drangs pas na/ /de dag kun kyang 'dir mchis so/ /de nas rgyal po rnam thos bu/ /langs te thal mo rab
sbyar nas/ /zhabs la 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' ba/ /gser gyi mchod sdong 'bar ba bzhin/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa po/ /thub pa chen po me dang 'dra/ /gnod sbyin
gsang sngags mi bzad can/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dag /byang gi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/ /byang phyogs dag tu gnod par bgyi/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan

sngar ni/ /de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/ /s+yad ya the dan/ khang+ge khang+ge/ khang+ga gar+b+he/ bi tsik+Sha Ne tsakra/ rA dza ne/ tsan+d+re/ tsa ba le/ pA tA khe/ b+hI ma ba da ba ti/ kha ra gre b+h+r-i ku
@#/ /Ti la ka rA gre /e kA k+Shi/ par ga ba ti/ sA raM ga ba ti/ mArga ba ti/ tsi tra ba ti/ tsi tra kAn+ti/ bdag byang phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swAhA/ tshangs
pa dang ni brgya byin dang / /'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang / /'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang / /bdag gi me tog spos dag dang //
sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis/ /de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang / /gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang / /nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/ /bdag 'jigs
pa dang / gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig /phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal
lo| |chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal chen yul 'khor srung ba yang / /langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas/ /me tog tshogs ltar rgyas gyur cig /ka la ping ka'i
sgra dbyangs can/ /khu byug dang ni rma bya'i sgra/ /rnga dang 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa/ /thub chen gnod sbyin srin po dang / /dri za stong phrag drug cu bzhi/ /shar gyi phyogs cha'i
phyogs na gnas/ /shar phyogs pa la gnod par byed/ /'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ /de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ d+hA ra Ni d+hA ra Ni/ pra

d+h+wan sa na b+hany+dza ni/ pra b+hany+dza ni bi d+ha ma ni/ kim pu ru She/ sha ka le/ sA ra the/ sA ra ba ti/ shU la d+ha re/ shU la d+hA ri Ni/ shud+d+he tsa ra Ne/ g+ho Sha ba ti/ shA rA gre/ shAn+te/ bdag shar
phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swAhA/ tshangs pa de bzhi brgya byin dang / /'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang / /'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa
yang | |bdag gi me tog spos dag dang / /sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis/ /de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang / /gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang / /nad rnams thams
cad bcom bar gyur/ /bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog
khyod la/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes kyang / /thal mo sbyar te de nas langs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa
thams cad gzigs/ /smra ba thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ /'jig rten thams cad rnam 'dren pa/ /grul bum yi dwags srul po dag /
stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/ /lho yi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/ /de nas byung la gnod par bgyid/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /de dag chad pa bdag gis
@#/ /bshad/ /s+yAd ye the dan/ shAn+ti/ shA ra ba ti/ kAn+ti/ kA ra ba ti/ kiM ka ra si/ kiM ka ra ti/ ki ka si ki ri Ni/ kiM ra te/ kiM ba te/ d+ha ra Ni/ bar+d+ha ni/
b+hU mi/ d+hA r-i Ni/ hi ma ba ti/ dz+yo tiSh+tsa ra Ne/ mA lA gre/ bdag lho phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / /'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che//
gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang / /'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang / /bdag gi me tog spos dag dang / /sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar bgyi/ /de dag gis ni brtson
'grus dang / /gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang / /nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/ /bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las dge
bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal
lo| |rgyal po mig mi bzang ba yang / /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs/ /sprin chen seng ge chen po pa/ /che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che/ /gsung ba chen po dpa' chen po/ /g.yul
chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa/ /klu dang 'dab bzang gsang ba po/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dag /nub kyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/ /de nas byung la gnod par bgyid//
'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ d+ha rmi ba rA gre/ ba la pa te/ ba li ni/ bi shi ge /bi tsa shi /sA ga re/ khA rI/ ka pa
li| tsaN+Da li/ ki ri Ni/ nI rany+dza ne/ bi d+hA ra Ni/ ba l+la ma hi/ a tsa le/ bdag nub phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / /'jig rten skyong
dang dbang phyug che/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang / /'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang / /bdag gi me tog spos dag dang / /sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar bgyis/ /de
dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang / /gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang / /nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/ /bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad las
dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen yang / /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs/ /tshangs pas bkrus pa dag pa po/ /rig byed kun gyi pha rol phyin/ /skye bo dga' mdzad
sman pa'i rje/ /'jig rten thams cad gso mdzad pa/ /gnod sbyin srin po gang gi rnams/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams gnas pa dang / /sa yi 'og dang bar dang steng //
@#/ /nam mkha' dag la gnas pa'i gdon/ /'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ /de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ brah+me/ brah+ma
g+ho She/ brah+ma swa re/ badzre badzra g+ho She/ badzra d+ha re/ s+thi te sA re/ a tsa le/ a ra Ne/ i Sha ni/ a rA Ni te/ shU re/ ba rA gra /prA p+te/ sA ga ra pa te/ bdag phyogs thams
cad du dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / /'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang / /'phrog ma bu dang
bcas pa yang / /bdag gi me tog spos dag dang / /spyin sreg 'di ni blang bar bgyis/ /de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang / /gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang / /
nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/ /bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur/ /bad
kan las gyur 'dus las gyur/ /nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/ /bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyag 'tshal
skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
'di snyam du dgongs te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyal srid gcig gi phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong
khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / grong dang / khyim nas sems can gcig gi bar gyi don gyi phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin gyi/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/
bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i don du sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ste/ de ni/ dper na/ sman pa mkhas pa'i mchog tu phyin pa/ gso ba la brtson pa/ sman pas shes par bya ba/ shin tu bslabs
pa rgyal po gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin/ yul gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin pa nas sems can gcig gyi don gyi bar du byung ba ma yin pa dang 'dra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na| phyogs gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i phyogs de dag tu mi rnams dang / mi ma yin pa dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar mi bya bar sems kyi/ nga'ang
yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ba dang / yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don kyang byas par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi
@#/ /mdzad pa'ang byas par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang / sham thabs man bas nas
lhung bzed bsnams te dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shod du gshegs pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas
lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yas rol nas phul lo/ /phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to//
lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yon rol nas phul lo/ /phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul
yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang re re zhing lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te bcom ldan 'das la snam logs nas bcom
ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur ro/ /lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin
mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang bcas pas kyang so so nas lha'i gdugs dag blangs te/ nyan thos rnams la bul nas rdul yab
kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to/ /de lta bu'i grags pa dang / bkur sti dang / brnyas par bya ba brnyes nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig
tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shod du babs te yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha pI rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
shin tu mdzes pa/ dad par 'os pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba/ dul ba dang / zhi gnas kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ dbang
po dben zhing khugs pa/ glang po chen po lta bu shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dwangs shing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
sku legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu brgyan pa/ shing sA la'i rgyal po ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par spras pa/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi
dra ba kun tu 'gyed pa/ mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na ri bo'i spo la me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba dang 'dra zhing bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bo chen po dam pa ltar lham me/ lhan ne/
lhang nge rgyang ring po nas gnas der gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur nas sems
@#/ /dad par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por lam gang nas gshegs pa'i lam de phyags shing chag chag
'debs/ byi dor byed/ me tog 'thor/ dar gyi lda ldi dang / dril bu dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te bdug spos sna tshogs
kyis gdugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
phyag gi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i ri mo can/ me tog pad+ma'i snying po ltar 'jam pa/ sngon legs par spyad pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ gzhon sha
chags shing 'jam pa/ nyi ma'i 'od zer bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ 'od zer brgya phrag mang po kun tu 'phro ba/ dri ma med pa'i phyag gis lits+tsha pI dag gi mgo la
byugs te rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i nang du gshegs nas nam gyi gung thun la sgo skyes kyi gzhi zhabs
kyis mnan nas phyogs bzhir gzigs te/ phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas na bza' bla gos gsol te bka' stsal pa/ phyi ma'i dus na dge slong ngam/ dge slong
ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gang su yang rung ba dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa byed pa dang / stong
chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing ston pa dang / kun chub par byed pa la yams nad
dang | 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrugs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / kha mchu dang / shags dang / tha na phra ma
dang | sdig pa mi dge ba'i sdug bsngal ba'i las kyis mi tshugs shing 'tshe bar byed pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi
rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
@#/ /snyed rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya de gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa/ de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin no zhes
gsol nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /s+yAd ya the

dan| a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ sA ra ma tsa le/ pra kri te bar+Ne pra kr-i ti nir+g+ho She/ sa man+ta mu khe/ s+thi re s+thA ba re bi g+huSh+Te/ shap+te pra ga la Ni/ pA rang+ga me sA rA su te sA rang+ga ba te
ba le mahA ba le mahA nir+b+hA se swA hA/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lus su gtogs pa dran pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / ting nge 'dzin gsum dang / rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dbang
po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / rjes su dran pa drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / rnam par grol ba'i skye mched bcu gcig dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu
gnyis dang / rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa rjes su dran pa bcu drug dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyad dang / yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te tshangs pa/ de ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i mdo/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste sangs rgyas bsgrubs pa'o/ /chos
bsgrubs pa'o/ /dge 'dun bsgrubs pa'o/ /tshangs pa bsgrubs pa'o/ /dbang po bsgrubs pa'o/ /'jig rten skyong ba bsgrubs pa'o/ /dbang phyug bsgrubs pa'o/ /bden pa
bsgrubs pa'o/ /lam bsgrubs pa'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgrubs pa'o/ /zla ba bsgrubs pa'o/ /nyi ma bsgrubs pa'o/ /gza' bsgrubs pa'o/ /rgyu skar bsgrubs
